tika-abh04t0:4_1: Abhidhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo tassā ādigāthāya tāva payojanasambandhābhidhānapubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-abh04t0:4_2: atthaṃ niddhārento uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ nisammakārīnaṃ paṭipatti paresaṃ vividhahitasukhanipphādanappayojanāti
tika-abh04t0:4_3: ācariyassāpi dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya ādimhi satthari nipaccakārassa antarāyavisosanatthatā viya satthari dhamme
tika-abh04t0:4_5: Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammoti sāmaññavacanopi dhamma-
tika-abh04t0:5_6: So ca kiñcāpi “idāni adhippetaṃ paṇāmaṃ karonto”tiādinā “tassa pāde namassitvā”tiādikassa adhippetapaṇāmabhāvaṃ dassessati,
tika-abh04t0:5_7: “karuṇā viyā”tiādikassa pana sabbassa thomanāvasena vuttassapi vasena veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:5_8: So hi satthu mahākaruṇādiguṇavisesakittanavasena pavatto mahākaruṇādiguṇavisesāvinābhāvinā saṃvaṇṇiyamānasaṃvaṇṇanādhammavibhāvitena
tika-abh04t0:5_9: dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena svākkhātadhamme satthari anuppannasaddhānaṃ saddhājananāya,
tika-abh04t0:5_11: Satthuno ca aviparītadhammadesanabhāvena avitathadesanābhūte dhammeti etena satthuno mahākaruṇādiguṇānaṃyeva
tika-abh04t0:6_0: Evaṃ satthari paṇāmakaraṇassa ekaṃ payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni sambandhaṃ vibhāveti “tadubhayappasādā hī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:6_1: Na hi satthari dhamme vā appasanno saṃvaṇṇiyamāne tadadhigantabbe ca dhamme sammā paṭipajjati,
tika-abh04t0:6_3: tasmā dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu paresaṃ sammāpaṭipattiākaṅkhāya tathārūpadhammapaṭiggāhakehi ca viniyojitena
tika-abh04t0:6_4: satthari dhamme ca pasāduppādanaṃ satthari paṇāmakaraṇaṃ vihitanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:7_0: Bhagavato guṇasaṃkittanaṃ tassa dhammasaṅghānampi thomanā hotiyevāti vuttaṃ “ratanattayapaṇāmavacana”nti.
tika-abh04t0:7_4: Aviññūnaṃ appamāṇatāya abhājanatāya ca viññūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:7_5: Te hi buddhādīsu sagāravassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ jānantā tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññanti,
tika-abh04t0:7_6: sammadeva ca naṃ anutiṭṭhantā tadadhippāyaṃ pūrenti.
tika-abh04t0:7_7: Idhāpi purimanayeneva sambandho veditabbo pasādaviññāpanādimukhenapi sammāpaṭipattiākaṅkhāya paveditattā.
tika-abh04t0:8_0: Ettha ca paṭhamo atthavikappo saddhānusārīnaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena vutto,
tika-abh04t0:9_2: Sā hi khettasampattiyā ācariyassa ca ajjhāsayasampattiyā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh04t0:9_3: kammassa balānuppadānavasena purimakammanipphannassa vipākasantānassa antarā vemajjhe āyanti āpatantīti
tika-abh04t0:9_4: antarāyāti laddhanāmānaṃ rogādianatthānaṃ vidhāyakassa upapīḷakassa upacchedakassa vā kammassa viddhaṃsanasamattho
tika-abh04t0:9_7: Evañca katvā rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvavacanena antarāyassa kāraṇabhūtāya payogavipattiyā abhāvassa,
tika-abh04t0:9_9: “sabyāpajjhāya pajāya abyāpajjho viharatī”ti vacanena diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihāritāya ca pakāsanaṃ mahānāmasuttaṃyeva udāhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:10_0: Guṇavisesadassanatthanti etena satipi kāyamanopaṇāmānaṃ antarāyavisosanasamatthabhāve tehi paṇāmavisayassa
tika-abh04t0:10_3: Desanā vinayapiṭaketi ettha nanu vinayapiṭakassapi desanābhāvato desanāvinayapiṭakānaṃ bhedavacanaṃ na yuttanti?
tika-abh04t0:10_4: No na yuttaṃ “tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā”ti ettha viya samudāyadesanāya avayavadesanānaṃ ādhārabhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:10_5: Desanākāle vā manasā vavatthāpitāya vinayatantiyā vinayapiṭakabhāvato tadatthapaññāpanassa ca desanābhāvato bhedavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:10_8: tassa ca vinayapiṭakavisayo karuṇāpubbaṅgamo ca soti evamettha bhedavacanopapatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:11_0: Kathaṃ pana bhagavato desanā vinayapiṭake karuṇāppadhānā,
tika-abh04t0:11_3: vacanāni yathāparādhañca garahavacanāni vinayapiṭakadesanāyaṃ mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso mahāparisamajjhe abhāsi,
tika-abh04t0:11_5: tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī,
tika-abh04t0:11_6: tatopi karuṇāya kiccaṃ adhikanti adhippāyena vuttaṃ “vinayapiṭake karuṇāppadhānā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:11_8: suttantadesanāya mahākaruṇāsamāpattibahulo veneyyasantānesu tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṃ patiṭṭhapesīti karuṇāpaññāppadhānatā,
tika-abh04t0:11_9: abhidhammadesanāya pana sabbaññutaññāṇassa visayabhāvappahonako rūpārūpaparicchedo dhammasabhāvānurodhena pavattitoti paññāppadhānatā.
tika-abh04t0:11_10: Teneva ca kāraṇenātiādinā desanānurūpataṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya thomanā ācariyassa pakatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:12_0: Kusalā rūpaṃ cakkhumā dasa dāḷimādi samūhavasena atthānavabodhanattho viya atthāvabodhanattho hi saddappayogo attaparādhīno kevalo atthapadatthako,
tika-abh04t0:12_2: saddena saddapadatthako jāyatīti āha “karuṇā viyāti nidassanavacana”nti.
tika-abh04t0:12_3: Nidassanañhi nāma nidassitabbadhamme tena ca sambandhe sati hoti,
tika-abh04t0:12_4: nāññathāti tassa nidassanabhāvaṃ vibhāvento āha “yassa yathā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:13_0: “Tattha karuṇā viyāti nidassanavacana”ntiādinā nidassananidassitabbadhammānaṃ ādhāravisayabyāpārehi savisesanehi
tika-abh04t0:13_1: saha pakāsanavasena gāthāya atthatatvaṃ dassetvā avayavabhedavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kiratīti karuṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:13_2: Tattha nicchandarāgānaṃ bhūtapubbagatiyā vā sattatā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:13_5: “sabbe dhammā sabbākārenā”ti dhammānaṃ aññeyyattaṃ paṭikkhipati ñātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattābhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:13_7: Yatheva hi “ñeyyesu sabbesu pavattitthā”ti ettāvatā adhippetatthe siddhe tesaṃ attattaniyatāvirahasaṃsūcanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t0:13_10: evaṃ “dhammesu sabbesu pavattitthā”ti ettāvatā ca adhippetatthe siddhe dhammesu tassā paññāya ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhatāya
tika-abh04t0:13_14: saddā nīluppalasaddā viya aññamaññaṃ bhedābhedayuttāti “ñeyyā ca te dhammā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:14_0: Bhagavati pavattāvāti idaṃ yebhuyyena upamānopameyyatthānaṃ bhinnādhāratāya bhinnādhārassa ca upamānatthassa idha asambhavato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:14_1: Bhagavato karuṇāya aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvo satte saṃsāradukkhato uddharitvā accantasukhe nibbāne patiṭṭhapetuṃ
tika-abh04t0:14_5: bhagavato sāsanena rahadamiva sītalaṃ sampajjalitaṃ aggikkhandhampi samogāheyya.
tika-abh04t0:14_7: Uddhaṭāti padaṃ apekkhitvā mahoghapakkhandānaṃ sattānanti kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:14_9: kāmādimahoghapakkhande satte tato uddhaṭā natthañño koci maṃ ṭhapetvāti passato yathā bhagavato karuṇāya āvisanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh04t0:14_11: Atha vā aññesaṃ passantānanti yadipi pare passeyyuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:14_12: tathāpi na tesaṃ bhagavato viya karuṇokkamanaṃ atthi appaṭipattito attahitamattapaṭipattito cāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:15_5: Ayañca attho bhagavato anekadhātunānādhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇādivasena veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:15_6: Yathā ca passantassāti idaṃ rāgaggiādīhi lokasannivāsassa ādittatādiākāradassanaṃ bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanupāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:15_7: Taṃ pana bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
tika-abh04t0:15_15: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge
tika-abh04t0:15_16: parosataṃ ākārehi dassitanti ganthavitthāraṃ pariharituṃ saṃvaṇṇayituñca upāyaṃ dassetuṃ āha “taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-abh04t0:15_19: Tesampi hi vibhaṅgo “idha tathāgato satte passati apparajakkhe”tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge nānappakārena dassitoti purimanayeneva atidisati. Ādi-
tika-abh04t0:15_20: saddena tattha vibhattānaṃ paṭisambhidāsaccañāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:16_0: Nippadesasappadesavisayā karuṇā viya bhagavato paññāpi idha nippadesasappadesavisayā niravasesā adhippetāti
tika-abh04t0:16_1: tassā katipayabhedadassanena nayato tadavasiṭṭhabhedā gahetabbāti dassento “paññāggahaṇena cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:16_6: pañcagati pañcapadhāniyaṅgapañcaṅgikasamādhi indriya bala nissāraṇīyadhātu vimuttāyatana vimuttiparipācanīyadhammasaññādi,
tika-abh04t0:16_7: chasāraṇīyadhamma anussatiṭṭhāna agāravagārava nissāraṇiyadhātu satatavihāra anuttariya nibbedhabhāgiyapaññādi,
tika-abh04t0:16_8: sattaaparihāniyadhamma ariyadhana bojjhaṅga sappurisadhammanijjaravatthu saññā dakkhiṇeyyapuggalakhīṇāsavabalādi,
tika-abh04t0:16_9: aṭṭhapaññāpaṭilābhahetu micchatta sammatta lokadhamma ariyānariyavohāra ārambhavatthu kusītavatthu akkhaṇa
tika-abh04t0:16_12: dasanāthakaradhamma kasiṇāyatana akusalakammapatha kusalakammapatha micchatta sammatta ariyavāsa dasabalañāṇa asekkhadhammādi,
tika-abh04t0:16_29: ye ca anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādivibhāvanākārappavattāti evaṃpakārā bhagavato paññāpabhedā,
tika-abh04t0:16_32: Ko hi samattho bhagavato paññāya pabhede anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:16_33: Teneva bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā paññavantānaṃ aggabhūto dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ patianuyutto “apica me, bhante,
tika-abh04t0:17_0: Saṃsāramahoghapakkhandānaṃ sattānaṃ tato santāraṇatthaṃ paṭipanno tehi payojito nāma hoti asatipi tesaṃ
tika-abh04t0:17_1: tathāvidhe abhisandhiyanti vuttaṃ “sattā hi mahābodhiṃ payojentī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:17_4: Jātasaṃvaddhabhāvadassanena “anādi anidhano ca satto”ti evaṃpakārā micchāvādā paṭisedhitā honti.
tika-abh04t0:17_7: Karuṇā ādipaññā pariyosānanti idaṃ sambharaṇanipphattikālāpekkhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:17_10: Sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-abh04t0:17_11: Eso eva hi anavasesato buddhaguṇadassanupāyo yadidaṃ nayaggāhaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:17_12: Paradhanaharaṇāditopi virati paresaṃ anatthapariharaṇavasappavattiyā siyā karuṇūpanissayāti karuṇānidānaṃ sīlaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:18_6: saddassa mettākaruṇānaṃ vācakattā vakkhamānañca anuyogaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:18_11: Tanti paññaṃ visesetvā upamābhāvena vinivattā caritatthatāya.
tika-abh04t0:18_16: saddo tato aññadhammavisayo bhavituṃ na yuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:18_20: sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā visiṭṭhavibhattikānaṃ na hotīti samānavibhattitāyapi tameva sādhīyatīti “dayā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:18_22: Padhānatāya hi sāmaññatāya ca sā visesitabbā jātā.
tika-abh04t0:18_23: Tattha bhagavato tadaññesañca karuṇānaṃ vācakattā sāmaññatā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:18_26: “tāyā”ti pana kevalaṃ avatvā dayāvisesanabhāvena vuttattā appadhānāyapi karuṇāya paṭiniddeso yuttoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:18_27: Appadhānatā ca karuṇāya purimagāthāya vasena vuttā,
tika-abh04t0:19_1: ñātabbāti vakkhamānaññeva atthaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā codeti.
tika-abh04t0:19_2: Yadi evanti yadi aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā vacanamattameva gaṇhasi.
tika-abh04t0:19_3: Mettāti ca na yujjeyyāti yathā “mettacittataṃ āpanno”ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā karuṇā,
tika-abh04t0:19_4: evaṃ “nikkaruṇataṃ āpanno”ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā mettāti vacanamattaggahaṇe aṭṭhakathānampi virodhaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:19_13: rukkhattho viya dhavakhadirādīnaṃ anurakkhaṇattho mettākaruṇānaṃ sāmaññanti attho,
tika-abh04t0:19_14: adhippāyo pana “dayāpanno”ti ettha sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti anantaraṃ karuṇāya vuttattā dayā-
tika-abh04t0:19_16: Mettāpi hi karuṇā viya pāṇātipātaviratiyā kāraṇanti.
tika-abh04t0:19_17: “Adayāpanno”ti ettha pana kāruṇiko avihiṃ sajjhāsayattā paresaṃ vihesāmattampi na karoti,
tika-abh04t0:19_18: ko pana vādo pāṇātipātaneti nikkaruṇatāya pāṇātipātitā dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:19_19: Etamevatthaṃ sandhāya “evañhi aṭṭhakathānaṃ avirodho hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:19_22: evampikathaṃ pana karuṇā “dayā”ti jānitabbāti anuyogo tadavattho evāti codanaṃ manasi katvā karuṇā ca desanāyātiādinā karuṇāya eva gahaṇe kāraṇamāha.
tika-abh04t0:20_0: Nanu tāyātiādinā sāmatthiyatopi pakaraṇaṃ balavanti pakaraṇavaseneva karuṇāvisayassa ñātataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:20_1: Yathāruci pavattitthāti etaṃ purimagāthāya sappadesanippadesasattavisayāya karuṇāya gahitabhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:20_2: Yathārucipavatti hi ekasmiṃ anekesu ca icchānurūpappavattīti.
tika-abh04t0:20_3: “Idha pana nippadesasattavisayataṃ gahetu”nti etena siddhe sati ārambho ñāpakattho hotīti puna “sattesū”ti vacanaṃ imamatthavisesaṃ bodhetīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:20_4: Na devesuyevātiādināpi dayāsādhanassa samussāhanassa sattavisayabhāve sāmatthiyaladdhepi “sattesū”ti
tika-abh04t0:20_5: vacanaṃ tassa nippadesasattavisayabhāvo adhippetoti imaṃ visesaṃ ñāpetīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:21_1: Avasānamhi vasanto tidasālayeti vacanatoti etena tassa pāṭihāriyassa saddantarasannidhānena avacchinnataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:21_2: Tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkāti puthujjanasantānepi rāgādipaṭipakkhaharaṇassa abhāvato nicchandarāgesu
tika-abh04t0:21_3: sattavohāro viya puthujjanasantāne rāgādipaṭipakkhaharaṇavasena pavattaṃ tadabhāvepi bhagavato santāne
tika-abh04t0:21_4: ruḷhīvasena pāṭihāriyantveva vuccatīti na sakkā vattunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:21_5: Diṭṭhiharaṇavasena ye sammādiṭṭhikā jātā acelakakassapādayo viya,
tika-abh04t0:22_0: 3. Sītapabbatā nāma “sineruṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā yugandharo…pe… giri brahā”ti evaṃ vuttapabbatā.
tika-abh04t0:23_1: Sabbaso cakkavāḷasahassehi sabbaso āgamma sabbaso sannisinnenāti sambandhavasena tayo vikappā yuttā,
tika-abh04t0:23_2: sabbaso cakkavāḷasahassehi dasahi dasahīti pana aniṭṭhasādhanato paṭisedhito.
tika-abh04t0:23_3: Vajjitabbeti ye vajjetuṃ sakkā “atisammukhā atisamīpaṃ unnatappadeso”ti, ete.
tika-abh04t0:23_4: Itare pana tassā parisāya mahantabhāvena na sakkā pariharituṃ.
tika-abh04t0:24_1: samatthā”ti vatvā tesaṃ desetabbappakārajānanasamatthāti vacanaṃ attanā paṭividdhākārassa dhammasāmināpi paresaṃ desetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:24_2: Aññathā sabbepi sattā diṭṭhasaccā eva bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:26_3: Atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti sambandhoti “sosetvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāya aparakālakiriyāpekkhatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:27_2: Pārājikasaṅghādisesānaṃ sīlavipattibhāvato thullaccayādīnañca yebhuyyena ācāravipattibhāvato ācārasīlānaṃ tathā yojanā katā,
tika-abh04t0:27_3: tathā cārittasīlassa ācārasabhāvattā itaraṃ sabhāveneva gahetvā dutiyā.
tika-abh04t0:27_4: Asakkuṇeyyanti visuddhācārādiguṇasamannāgatena sabrahmacārinā saddhammaciraṭṭhitatthaṃ sādaraṃ abhiyācitena
tika-abh04t0:27_5: tena ca abhidhammatthappakāsane samatthoti yāthāvato pamāṇitena tabbimukhabhāvo na sukaroti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:28_0: 9. Devadeva-saddassa attho paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāṭīkāyaṃ vipañcitoti na vitthārayimha.
tika-abh04t0:29_1: Paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ yā aṭṭhakathā saṅgītāti vacanena sā bhagavato dharamānakālepi aṭṭhakathā saṃvijjati,
tika-abh04t0:29_3: “Abhidhammassā”ti padaṃ “atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti etadapekkhanti “kassa pana sā aṭṭhakathā”ti pucchitvā
tika-abh04t0:30_1: Ariyamaggassa bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ pādakajjhānameva niyametītiādinayappavatto tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādo ādi-
tika-abh04t0:30_8: etena abhidhammassa atthappakāsaneneva mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayo idha abhinipphādīyatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:30_12: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe “asammissaṃ anākulaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti sambandhanīyaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:31_1: Aññañca sabbaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ hotīti tosanaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-abh04t0:34_2: Sāgarehi tathā cintāti “imassa abhidhammassa gambhīrabhāvavijānanatthaṃ cattāro sāgarā veditabbā”tiādinā nayena jalasāgarādīhi saha nayasāgaravicāro.
tika-abh04t0:34_3: “Satabhāgena sahassabhāgena dhammantarā dhammantaraṃ saṅkamitvā saṅkamitvā desesī”tiādinā desanābhedehi
tika-abh04t0:35_0: “Evaṃ temāsaṃ nirantaraṃ desentassā”tiādinā desanākāle bhagavato sarīrassa yāpitākāravicāro desanā…pe… gahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:35_1: Tathā therassa…pe…pi cāti “abhidhamme vācanāmaggo nāmā”tiādinā abhidhamme vācanāmaggassa sāriputtattherasambandhitatā tassa ca teneva uppāditatā.
tika-abh04t0:35_3: so aparicchinnavāranayatantitāya ananto aparimāṇo na bhikkhūnaṃ vācanāyoggo,
tika-abh04t0:36_0: Vacanatthavijānanenātiādinā kusalā dhammātiādipadānaññeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ akatvā abhidhamma-
tika-abh04t0:36_5: sikkhitaṃ sikkhiṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā”tiādisuttavasena kiñcāpi bodhipakkhiyadhammā “abhidhammo”ti vuccanti, dhamma-
tika-abh04t0:36_7: pariyattidhammo eva pana idha adhippetoti dassento “suttantādhikā pāḷīti attho”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:36_8: Tattha dhammabyabhicārabhāvena visesato abhidhammo viya suttantopi “dhammo”ti vuccati. “Yo vo, ānanda,
tika-abh04t0:36_9: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto”tiādīsu aññattha ca sambhavato abhi-
tika-abh04t0:36_11: Nanu ca atirekavisesaṭṭhā bhinnasabhāvā yato te yathākkamaṃ adhikavicittapariyāyehi bodhitā,
tika-abh04t0:36_13: na ekavacanenāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “dvinnampi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:37_5: Evampi yathā “atimālā”ti ettha samāsavasena anāvibhūtāya kamanakiriyāya visesako ati- saddo,
tika-abh04t0:37_10: atthe upasajjatīti vā upasaggassa anvatthasaññataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:37_13: Tattha yathā kalyāṇo pūjito vā puriso atipurisoti bhavati,
tika-abh04t0:37_14: evaṃ atirekavisesaṭṭhānampi kalyāṇapūjitatthabhāvasambhavato kalyāṇaṃ vā pūjitaṃ vā chattaṃ atichattanti saddanayo veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:37_16: Guṇaviseso cesa yadidaṃ pamāṇātireko ca vicittarūpatā ca.
tika-abh04t0:37_17: Evañca pana katvā “akiriyāyapī”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati.
tika-abh04t0:38_0: Ekato anāgatattāti idaṃ suttante ekato āgatānaṃ khandhāyatanādīnaṃ suttantabhājanīyassa diṭṭhattā “cha imāni,
tika-abh04t0:38_2: indriyānī”tiādinā cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ itthindriyādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sukhindriyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saddhindriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t0:38_3: pañcannaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīnañca tiṇṇaṃ vasena visuṃ visuṃ suttantabhāvena āgatattā ekasuttabhāvena
tika-abh04t0:38_4: anāgatānaṃ bāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ suttantabhājanīyassa adiṭṭhattā ca vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:38_5: na suttante ekato āgamanassa suttantabhājanīyassa kāraṇattā.
tika-abh04t0:38_6: Suttante ekato sabbena sabbañca anāgatā hi bhūmantaraparicchedapaṭisambhidā suttantabhājanīyavasena vibhattā dissanti,
tika-abh04t0:38_7: ekato āgatāni ca sikkhāpadāni tathā na vibhattāni.
tika-abh04t0:38_8: Veramaṇīnaṃ viya pana sabhāvakiccādivibhāgavinimutto bāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ samāno vibhajanappakāro natthi,
tika-abh04t0:38_9: yo suttantabhājanīyaṃ siyāti indriyavibhaṅge suttantabhājanīyaṃ natthīti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh04t0:39_1: yathā pana pavatto paccayadhammo paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-abh04t0:39_2: so tassa pavattiākāraviseso hetuādibhāvo tato añño viya paccayadhammassa paccayabhāvoti vutto,
tika-abh04t0:39_3: so ca “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”tiādīsu padhānabhāvena vutto.
tika-abh04t0:39_4: Tattha ca guṇībhūtā hetuhetuphalabhūtā avijjāsaṅkhārādayoti vuttaṃ “paccayabhāvo uddiṭṭho”ti.
tika-abh04t0:39_5: Uddiṭṭhadhammānantiādi uddesena paricchinnānaṃyeva khandhādīnaṃ khandhavibhaṅgādīsu pañhapucchakanayo dassito,
tika-abh04t0:40_3: Añño pana veramaṇīnaṃ vibhajitabbappakāro natthīti idaṃ atītāniccādivibhāgo veramaṇīnaṃ khandhāyatanādīsu antogadhattā tabbaseneva vijānitabbo,
tika-abh04t0:40_4: tato pana añño abhidhammanayavidhuro veramaṇīnaṃ vibhajitabbappakāro natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:40_6: jarāmaraṇaṃ anicca”nti anupadadhammasammasanakathāyaṃ na veramaṇiyo uddhaṭā.
tika-abh04t0:41_0: Nanu dhammasaṅgaṇīdhātukathādīnampi vasena abhidhammapāḷiyā atirekavisesabhāvo dassetabboti?
tika-abh04t0:41_2: so pana ekantaabhidhammanayanissito avuttopi siddhoti katvā na dassito.
tika-abh04t0:41_3: Etena vā nidassanena sopi sabbo netabbo.
tika-abh04t0:41_4: Abhidhammanayasāmaññena vā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhapucchakehi so vutto evāti na vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:42_2: Apekkhāvasikattā appamahantabhāvassa yato appamattikā mahādhātukathātanti dhammahadayavibhaṅgavacanavasena avasesā,
tika-abh04t0:42_3: taṃ dassanatthaṃ “dhammahadayavibhaṅge anāgantvā mahādhammahadaye āgatatantito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:42_5: āgatatantito rūpakaṇḍadhātuvibhaṅgādīsu anāgantvā mahādhātukathāyaṃ āgatatanti appamattikāvāti sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:42_6: Atha dhātukathāya vitthārakathā mahādhātukathā dhammahadayavibhaṅge anāgantvā mahādhammahadaye āgatatantito
tika-abh04t0:42_7: dhātukathāyaṃ anāgantvā mahādhātukathāya āgatatanti appamattikāvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:43_2: Saccikaṭṭhaṃ nissayanti “sabbatthā”tiādinā desādianāmasanena rūpādisattapaññāsadhammappabhedaṃ saccikaṭṭhameva nissayabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:43_3: Sabbatthāti etthāpi “upalabbhati nupalabbhatīti paṭiññāya gahitāya paṭikkhepaggahaṇattha”nti ānetvā sambandhanīyaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:43_9: Saccikaṭṭhadesakālappadesehi kathaṃ saccikaṭṭhādīnaṃ padeso ekadesabhūto sabboti vuccati?
tika-abh04t0:43_11: “Sabbesu padesesū”ti paccekaṃ bhedāmasanavasena cāyaṃ pañho pavattoti na purimehi avaseso.
tika-abh04t0:44_2: vasena pavattā tanti paṭhamapañcakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ eko avayavoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:44_4: Niggahassa suniggahabhāvaṃ icchato sakavādino “tvaṃ ce pana maññasi vattabbe kho puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādinā paṭiññāṭhapanena,
tika-abh04t0:44_5: tena “tava tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṃ paṭijānanto hevaṃ niggahetabbe atha taṃ niggaṇhāma suniggahito
tika-abh04t0:44_6: ca hotī”ti vatvā “hañci puggalo nupalabbhatī”tiādinā paravādino attano paṭikammaṃ yathā sakavādī na nibbeṭheti,
tika-abh04t0:44_8: Paravādino paṭikammassa duppaṭikammabhāvaṃ icchato sakavādino taṃnidassanena “eso ce dunniggahito heva”nti paṭikammanidassanena,
tika-abh04t0:44_11: No ca mayaṃ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṃ paṭijānanto hevaṃ niggahetabbā.
tika-abh04t0:44_12: Atha amhe niggaṇhāsi dunniggahitā ca homā”ti vatvā “hañci puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādinā niggahassa dunniggahitabhāvadassanena
tika-abh04t0:44_14: “Tena hi yaṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci puggalo upalabbhatī”tiādiṃ vatvā “tena hi ye kate niggahe se niggahe dukkaṭe
tika-abh04t0:44_15: sukate paṭikamme sukatā paṭipādanā”ti sakavādino niggahassa,
tika-abh04t0:44_16: aniggahabhāvāropanena attano paṭikammassa supaṭikammabhāvakaraṇena ca sakavādino niggahassa chedo vināsanaṃ puggalavādanisedhanavasena samuṭṭhitattā.
tika-abh04t0:44_17: Dhammatāya anulomanavasena uṭṭhahitvā tabbilomanavasena pavatto anulomapaccanīkapañcako vuttavipariyāyena dutiyapañcako veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:45_0: Tadādhāroti te saccikaṭṭhaparamatthā rūpādayo ādhārā etassāti tadādhāro.
tika-abh04t0:45_1: Etena “rūpasmiṃ attā”ti evaṃpakāro puggalavādo dassito hoti.
tika-abh04t0:45_2: Tesaṃ vā ādhārabhūtoti etena “attani rūpa”nti evaṃpakāro.
tika-abh04t0:45_3: Aññatra vā tehīti tehi rūpādīhi vinā.
tika-abh04t0:45_6: Taṃsāmibhūtatāya vā tadadhīnabhāvena “aññatra vā tehī”ti vuttanti “rūpavā attā”ti evaṃpakāro puggalavādo dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:45_10: Rūpādito añño anañño vā aññatte ca tadādhārādibhūto upalabbhamāno āpajjatīti anuyuñjati sakavādī pakārantarassa asambhavato.
tika-abh04t0:45_11: Puggalavādī puggalassa rūpādīhi na aññattaṃ icchati rūpādi viya paccakkhato anumānato vā gāhayituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-abh04t0:45_13: Nāpi anaññattaṃ ruppanasappaccayādisabhāvappasaṅgato puggalasseva abhāvappasaṅgato ca.
tika-abh04t0:45_14: Yatheva hi na vinā indhanena aggi paññāpiyati,
tika-abh04t0:45_15: na ca aññaṃ indhanato aggiṃ sakkā paṭijānituṃ,
tika-abh04t0:45_21: Evameva na vinā rūpādīhi puggalo paññāpiyati,
tika-abh04t0:45_23: nāpi anañño sassatucchedabhāvappasaṅgatoti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā puggalavādī “na hevā”ti paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh04t0:45_24: Tattha aggindhanopamā tāva yadi lokavohārena vuttā,
tika-abh04t0:45_27: tañca ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ purimapacchimakālikaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:45_28: yadi evaṃ puggalo rūpādīhi añño anicco ca āpanno.
tika-abh04t0:45_30: tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhādike paḷitte yaṃ usumaṃ so aggi,
tika-abh04t0:45_32: evampi siddhaṃ lakkhaṇabhedato aggindhanānaṃ aññattanti aggi viya indhanato rūpādīhi añño puggalo anicco ca āpannoti byāhatāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:46_0: Puggalo upalabbhatīti paṭijānantassa pakārantarassa asambhavato vuttesu pakāresu ekena pakārena upalabbhamāno
tika-abh04t0:46_3: puggale paṭisiddhe tadabhinivesopi ayāthāvato puggalavādino gahitākārasuññatāvibhāvanena sakaṭṭhānato
tika-abh04t0:46_4: cāvito paṭisedhito eva nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “puggaladiṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento”ti.
tika-abh04t0:46_6: “Sāmī nivāsī kārako vedako nicco dhuvo”ti abhinivesavisayabhūto hi parikappamattasiddho puggalo idha paṭikkhipīyati,
tika-abh04t0:46_9: puggalā”tiādinā vuttavohārapuggaloti ananuyogo ākāsakusumassa rattanīlādibhāvavicāraṇā viyāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:46_10: Pubbe “nupalabbhatī”ti paṭijānitvā visesacodanāya anāpajjanato puna “na hevā”ti paṭikkhepo paṭiññāya āpajjanaleso.
tika-abh04t0:46_11: Vañjhāputtakassa dīgharassatānuyogassa viya sabbena sabbaṃ paramatthato anupalabbhamānassa puggalassa
tika-abh04t0:46_12: rūpādīhi aññānaññatānuyogassa ananuyogabhāvo eva idha aviparītattho.
tika-abh04t0:47_0: Yaṃkāraṇāti etena “yatonidāna”nti ettha vibhattialopo daṭṭhabboti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:47_4: tīhipi abhivadanaṃ avisesena vā tīhipi tayo yojetabbā.
tika-abh04t0:47_5: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbantiādinā abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvasūcanena phalūpacārato abhinandanādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t0:47_7: taṃ paccāmasanañca esevāti idanti katvā vuttaṃ “abhi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:48_0: “Ñāyatīti jāna”nti ukkaṃsagativijānanena niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya jānātikiriyāya
tika-abh04t0:48_1: sabbaññutaññāṇameva karaṇaṃ bhavitumarahatīti “sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:48_5: Jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti titthiyā paṭhamajjhānaarūpajjhānehi kāmarūpapariññāvādino.
tika-abh04t0:48_10: Atha vā dibbacakkhuādikaṃ pañcavidhampi cakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti cakkhubhūto.
tika-abh04t0:48_12: Sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sātisayo bhagavato vattuādibhāvoti vuttaṃ “catusaccadhamme vadatīti vattā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:49_1: Tesañca pāḷipadesānaṃ ekekaṃ padaṃ uddharitvāpi kiñcāpi kusalattikapadāniyeva uddharitvā cittuppādakaṇḍe cittāni vibhattāni,
tika-abh04t0:49_2: kusalattikena pana sabhāvadhammasaṅgahitānaṃ sesattikadukapadānaṃ asaṅgahitānaṃ abhāvato kusalattikapaduddhārena
tika-abh04t0:50_0: So ca dhammoti “tayo kusalahetū”tiādīsu purimāya purimāya pāḷiyā pacchimā pacchimā atthaniddesoti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:50_2: saddassa viya saddanayo daṭṭhabboti dassetuṃ “samānaṃ karontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:52_0: Ekādhikesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesūti “jātimado”tiādinā ekakavasena āgatā tesattati,
tika-abh04t0:52_10: “ajjhattikassuppādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā aṭṭhārasakavasena aṭṭhasatanti evaṃ ekādhikesu aṭṭhasu kilesasatesu.
tika-abh04t0:52_12: Te brahmajālasuttāgatāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi saha pañcapaññāsādhikaṃ sattasataṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:53_3: upacayādidvayaṃ ekaṃ katvā sattavīsati rūpāni cāti ime asīti dhammā,
tika-abh04t0:53_4: imesu bhāvadvaye ekaṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikā ekūnāsīti,
tika-abh04t0:53_5: bāhirā ekūnāsītīti sabbepi aṭṭhapaññāsādhikaṃ sataṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:53_6: Imesu ekekasmiṃ dasannaṃ dasannaṃ kilesānaṃ uppajjanato asītiadhikaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:54_3: lakkhaṇarūpāni cāti pañcasattati dhammā ajjhattabahiddhābhedato paññāsasataṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:54_4: Tattha ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa kilesātipi diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:54_5: Tathā ettha vedanaṃ sukhindriyādivasena pañcavidhaṃ katvā sattapaññāsa arūpadhammā,
tika-abh04t0:54_6: aṭṭhārasa rūparūpāni cāti pañcasattati vipassanūpagadhammā ajjhattabahiddhābhedato paññāsasataṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:54_7: Etesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa kilesātipi diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:55_13: ime pañcadvārikā pañcasu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ dvāsattatīti saṭṭhiadhikāni tīṇi satāni,
tika-abh04t0:55_14: manodvārikā pana chasu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ dvāsattati dvāsattatīti katvā dvattiṃsādhikāni cattāri satāni,
tika-abh04t0:55_16: tāni ajjhattabahiddhāvisayatāya caturāsītiadhikaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:56_3: paññatti cāti ekavīsatiyā ārammaṇesu dvāsattati dvāsattati kilesāti dvādasādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ honti.
tika-abh04t0:57_0: Atha vā dvādasasu akusalacittuppādesu paṭhame vīsati dhammā,
tika-abh04t0:57_11: dvādasame soḷasāti sabbe akusaladhammā chattiṃsādhikāni dve satāni,
tika-abh04t0:57_12: ime chasu ārammaṇesu paccekaṃ chattiṃ sādhikāni dve satāni,
tika-abh04t0:57_13: sabbe soḷasādhikāni cattāri satāni ca sahassaṃ hontīti evampi diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:58_3: Paramatthato atītādīnaṃ maggena appahātabbattā “atītādibhāvāmasanā aggahaṇaṃ khepane”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:58_4: Yaṃ pana paṭṭhāne “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tike,
tika-abh04t0:58_5: tathā dassanena pahātabbātītatikatike “atītā dassanena pahātabbā”tiādinā ca tīsu kālesu dassanādipahātabbavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh04t0:58_6: taṃ atītādīnaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhatāya apāyagamanīyatāya ca dassanapahātabbehi niratisayattā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:59_0: Na bhāsitatthavacananti idaṃ “hitapariyāyavacana”nti etena nivattitassa ekadesakathanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:59_5: “Na haññadatthatthipasaṃsalābhā”ti padassa niddese “attattho vā parattho vā”tiādinā kiñcāpi suttanirapekkhaṃ
tika-abh04t0:59_7: tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ nātikkamatīti āha “te suttaṃ sūcetī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:59_15: mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno,
tika-abh04t0:59_25: saddo upacaritoti adhippāyenāha “idameva atthānaṃ sūcanato suttanti vutta”nti.
tika-abh04t0:59_26: Ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanāti idampi vineyyānaṃ hitasampāpane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:60_1: Nanu ca “abhirattī”ti avuttattā rattiggahaṇaṃ na kattabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:60_2: “abhiññātā abhilakkhitā”ti ca ñāṇalakkhaṇakiriyāvisesako abhi- saddoti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:60_5: Ettha ca vācakasaddasannidhāne nipātānaṃ tadatthajotakamattattā lakkhitasaddatthajotako abhi-
tika-abh04t0:60_8: abhivinayasaddassa pana abhipurisassa viya samāsasiddhi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:61_1: āṇādayo pana visesato desakādiadhīnāti taṃtaṃvisesayogavasena tesaṃ bhedo vutto.
tika-abh04t0:61_2: Yathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ tattha kosallayogato,
tika-abh04t0:61_3: evaṃ vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti āṇādividhino desakāyattatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:61_4: Aparādhajjhāsayānurūpaṃ viya dhammānurūpampi sāsanaṃ visesato tathāvinetabbapuggalāpekkhanti vuttaṃ “sāsitabba…pe…
tika-abh04t0:61_6: Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya viniveṭhetabbāya diṭṭhiyāpi kathanaṃ sati vācāvatthusmiṃ,
tika-abh04t0:62_2: visayavisayimukhena vā vinayādīnaṃyeva gambhīrabhāvassa vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:62_6: “Paṭivedhassā”tiādinā dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭividdhattā desanāya uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā paṭivedhassa uppādetuñca
tika-abh04t0:63_1: Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītaṃ savisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati yato “aviparītābhilāpo”ti vuccati.
tika-abh04t0:63_3: Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo pāḷiyaṃ vutto,
tika-abh04t0:63_5: Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācakoti vacanavacanīyaṃ vavatthapetvā taṃtaṃvacanīyavibhāvanavasena pavattito hi saddo desanāti.
tika-abh04t0:63_6: Nanu ca “dhammo tantī”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassapi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ viseso na siyāti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:63_7: tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto uggahitādivasena ca pubbe pavattito saddappabandho dhammo,
tika-abh04t0:63_8: pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito tadatthappakāsanako saddo desanāti.
tika-abh04t0:63_9: Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā musāvādādayo viya.
tika-abh04t0:63_18: abhisamīyati vā etenāti abhisamayoti evampi abhisamayattho sambhavati.
tika-abh04t0:64_0: Vuttanayena veditabbāti avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-abh04t0:64_1: tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato taṃdesanāya paṭivedhanasaṅkhātassa paṭivedhassa uppādanavisayikaraṇānaṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:65_0: Kāraṇe phalavohārena te dhammā dukkhāya saṃvattantīti vuttanti āha “upārambha…pe…
tika-abh04t0:65_7: Purimaṃ vā saṅgītiyāti bhāvena bhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:66_0: Tattha aṅgesu suttaṅgameva na sambhavati “sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:66_2: maṅgalasuttādīnañca suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya,
tika-abh04t0:66_3: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya,
tika-abh04t0:69_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-abh04t0:69_2: “Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”ti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:69_3: tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitattā.
tika-abh04t0:69_5: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:69_6: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa.
tika-abh04t0:70_0: Evaṃ sante sagāthakānampi pañhavissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-abh04t0:70_1: Nāpajjati veyyākaraṇādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato “gāthāvirahe pana satī”ti visesitattā ca.
tika-abh04t0:70_2: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttesu “vuttañheta”ntiādivacanasambandhesu
tika-abh04t0:70_3: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-abh04t0:70_4: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā.
tika-abh04t0:70_5: Satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-abh04t0:70_6: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
tika-abh04t0:71_1: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:71_3: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇabhāvassa nimittanti.
tika-abh04t0:71_4: Yañca vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-abh04t0:71_7: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
tika-abh04t0:71_9: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ suttanāmakanti nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh04t0:71_10: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:71_14: sahabhāvo ca nāma attato aññena hoti,
tika-abh04t0:71_15: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi,
tika-abh04t0:71_17: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
tika-abh04t0:71_20: Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-abh04t0:71_21: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:72_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “so evaṃ pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:72_7: Paravādicodanaṃ patvāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ paravādicodanaṃ patvā.
tika-abh04t0:72_9: rūpenāti adhigantabbo ca so desetabbo cāti adhigantabbadesetabbo,
tika-abh04t0:72_12: Ettha ca yathādhammasāsanattā yathādhigatadhammadesanābhāvato abhidhammassa abhisambodhi adhigamanidānaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:72_14: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “desanānidānaṃ yāva dhammacakkappavattanā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:72_17: paramatthato abhidhammabhūtānaṃ vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ tattha desitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:72_18: Tattakānaṃyeva desanāruḷhatāya aḍḍhachakkesu jātakasatesu paripācanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:72_19: Na hi ettakāsu eva jātīsu puññādisambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:72_20: kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ettakā eva jātiyo desitāti?
tika-abh04t0:74_0: Uppanne buddhe tato attānaṃ seyyato vā sadisato vā dahanto jhānābhiññāhi parihāyati,
tika-abh04t0:74_1: na tathā sumedhapaṇḍito aṭṭhāsīti tassa jhānābhiññāhi aparihāni daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:74_4: aññaṃ vā niccābhimataṃ aviparītavuttitāya sabbakālaṃ tathābhāvena “sassata”nti vuccati,
tika-abh04t0:74_5: evaṃ buddhānaṃ vacananti tassa sassatatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:74_8: Samādānādhiṭṭhānanti samādānassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ karaṇanti attho.
tika-abh04t0:74_10: Mahānubhāvañhi taṃ ñāṇaṃ bodhisambhāresu anāvaraṇaṃ anācariyakaṃ mahābodhisamuppattiyā anurūpapubbanimittabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:74_14: Līnatāti ca saṅkoco vīriyahāni vīriyārambhassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t0:78_2: Sabbapadehīti tīhi padehi laddhanāmo hoti avayavadhammenāpi samudāyassa apadisitabbato yathā “samaṃ cuṇṇa”nti.
tika-abh04t0:78_3: Codako yathādhippetamatthaṃ appaṭipajjamāno vibhattiantasseva padabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā “nanu sukhāyā”tiādinā codeti.
tika-abh04t0:79_3: Ettha ca sahetukahetusampayuttadukātiādinā yathā hetugocchake paṭhamadukasambandhā dutiyatatiyadukā,
tika-abh04t0:79_7: Sakkā hi imināva nayena tesupi dukantarasambandho viññātuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:79_10: Dhammānaṃ sāvasesaniravasesabhāvena tikadukānaṃ sappadesanippadesatā vuttāti yehi tikadukā sāvasesāti padissanti apadissanti,
tika-abh04t0:79_14: Atha vā padissati etena samudāyoti padeso, avayavo.
tika-abh04t0:79_15: “Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatī”ti yathādhippetaṃ visesaṃ dassento “asaṅgahito”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:80_4: Kusena ñāṇena lātabbāti kusalāti ayamattho ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ tāva hotu,
tika-abh04t0:80_6: Ñāṇavippayuttāpi hi ñāṇeneva pavattiyanti hitasukhahetubhūtāya pavattiyā paññavantānaṃ paṭipattibhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:80_7: Na hi antarena yonisomanasikāraṃ kusaluppatti atthīti.
tika-abh04t0:80_9: kusā viya lunantīti kusalāti ayamattho yutto siyā”ti koci vadeyyāti āsaṅkāya āha “sammappadhānadvayaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:81_0: Na cātiādinā “sabhāvaṃ dhārentī”ti ettha paramatthato kattukammassa ca bhedo natthi,
tika-abh04t0:81_2: Tattha nāmavasena viññātāviññāteti yesaṃ “dhammā”ti iminā pariyāyena aviññātā sabhāvā,
tika-abh04t0:81_5: Ettha ca paṭhamo attho saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammavasena vutto,
tika-abh04t0:82_3: Akusalavacanena na koci attho sabhāvadhammassa abodhakattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:82_4: Atha siyā akusalavacanena koci attho asabhāvadhammabodhakattepi “paññattidhammā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-abh04t0:82_6: tato cāyaṃ catukko āpajjati, na tiko.
tika-abh04t0:82_7: Tasmāti yasmā dukacatukkabhāvo anabyākatavohāro ca natthi,
tika-abh04t0:82_8: so ca vuttanayena abhāvamattavacane āpajjati, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:83_5: Paccayuppannañhi paccayasambandhīti appaccayuppannattā asambandhitā ettha jotīyati.
tika-abh04t0:83_15: Manussattamattaṃ natthi aññaṃ samānanti sadisatā hettha sūciyati.
tika-abh04t0:83_21: Atītānañhi uppannapubbattā upādidhammānañca paccayekadesanipphattiyā āraddhuppādabhāvato kālavinimuttassa ca vijjamānattā uppannānukūlatā,
tika-abh04t0:83_25: tattha kiṃ vuccate atthadvayameva vatvā pārisesenāti?
tika-abh04t0:83_27: Na hi kusalavippayuttādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ akusalabhāvo yujjati.
tika-abh04t0:84_0: Akusalasaddassa uccāraṇānantaraṃ vineyyānaṃ kusalapaṭipakkhabhūte atthe paṭipattibhāvato tattha niruḷhatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:84_2: viruddhasabhāvattepi vināsakavināsitabbabhāvo kusalākusalesu niyatoti dassetuṃ “tappaheyyabhāvato”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:84_3: Itarathā kusalānampi akusalehi pahātabbabhāve accantaṃ samucchinnakusalamūlattā apāyapūrakā eva sattā siyuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:84_10: taṃ pajahathā”tiādīsu viya tadārammaṇasaṃkilesappahānavasena pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:85_1: Tabbacanīyabhāvenāti tehi “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā”tiādivacanehi abhidheyyabhāvena.
tika-abh04t0:85_3: evaṃ avipākatthā abyākatavacanena bodhitā evāti āha “abyākatavacaneneva cā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:85_4: Kāraṇaṃ avatvāti idha vuttabhāvena anuvattamānattāti kāraṇaṃ avatvā. Aññā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:85_5: nivāretabboti etena kusalākusalasaddā viya kusalākusalasabhāvānaṃ tadubhayaviparītasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ abyākatasaddo bodhakoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:85_8: Yato avipākavacanassa adhikatabhāvo akusalassa ca tabbacanīyabhāvena akathitabhāvo siyā,
tika-abh04t0:85_9: tasmā na akusalānaṃ abyākatatāti ayaṃ akusalānaṃ anabyākatabhāve yojanā.
tika-abh04t0:86_5: anavajjavacanaṃ panettha kusalānaṃ agarahitabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ kañci visesamāha.
tika-abh04t0:86_6: Teneva ca tassa visesanabhāvena vuttassa pavattisukhatādidassanabhāvaṃ sayameva vakkhatīti.
tika-abh04t0:86_7: Manosamācāravisesabhūtā phaladhammā visesena paṭippassaddhāvajjā nāma hontīti samācārattayavasena tasmiṃ
tika-abh04t0:86_8: sutte anavajjadhammānaṃ vuttattā ca te anavasesato saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “virahitāvajjamattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:86_11: Sukho vipāko etesanti sukhavipākāti iminā samāsena kusalānaṃ sukhavipākavantatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:86_12: Sā ca nesaṃ na taṃsamaṅgitāya asahavattanatoti taduppādanasamatthatāti viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “sukhavipākavipaccanasabhāvaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:86_13: Yuttametanti paramatthato bhedābhāvepi yathāvuttavacanavacanīyabhāvasaṅkhāto bhedo tasmiṃ abhidheyyatthabhūte
tika-abh04t0:86_14: vatthusmiṃ upacārena hotīti yuttamettha lakkhaṇalakkhitabbabhāvena bhedavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:86_15: Bhavati hi saddatthavisesamattenapi abhinne vatthusmiṃ bhedavacanaṃ yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-abh04t0:87_0: Vināpi bhāvābhidhāyinā saddena bhāvappadhāno niddeso hotīti vuttaṃ “anavajjavacanena anavajjattaṃ āhā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:87_15: Yadipi “avajjarahitaṃ anavajja”nti imasmiṃ pana pakkhe abyākatanivattanatthaṃ sukhavipākaggahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh04t0:87_16: sukhavipākaggahaṇe pana kate anavajjaggahaṇaṃ na kattabbameva.
tika-abh04t0:87_17: “Avajjapaṭipakkhā anavajjā”ti etasmiṃ pana pakkhe sukhavipākaggahaṇañcāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “tattha anavajjavacanenā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:87_23: taṃavipākatāya pana idha sukhavipākabhāvo na sakkā vattunti dassento āha “saṅkhā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:87_26: tebhūmakakusalānampi vivaṭṭasannissayabhāvena pavattisabhāvattā kiñcāpi sabbe kusalā saṅkhāradukkhūpasamasukhanipphādakā sambhavanti,
tika-abh04t0:87_27: yathāvuttasukhassa pana avipākabhāvato na etena padena kusalānaṃ sukhavipākatā sambhavatīti.
tika-abh04t0:88_3: Aññepi atthi dukkhabhāvena garahitabbasabhāvā akusalavipākāti sāvajjavacanamattena tesampi akusalatāpattidosaṃ
tika-abh04t0:88_5: saddo vā rāgādīsu ekantākusalesu niruḷhoti taṃsahavattidhammānaṃ eva sāvajjabhāve kusalābyākatehi akusalānaṃ viseso sāvajjavacaneneva dassito.
tika-abh04t0:88_6: Abyākatehi pana visiṭṭhaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ savipākatālakkhaṇanti tasmiṃ lakkhaṇe visesadassanatthaṃ dukkhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:88_7: Ito paraṃ “dukkho vipāko etesanti dukkhavipākā”tiādinā sukhavipākaanavajjakusalapadānaṃ ṭhāne dukkhavipākasāvajjaakusalapadāni
tika-abh04t0:88_9: Yojanā ca sāvajjavacanena akusalānaṃ pavattidukkhataṃ dasseti,
tika-abh04t0:88_17: Purimena vā avajjavantatādassanato kiccaṭṭhena rasena anatthajananarasataṃ dasseti,
tika-abh04t0:88_21: Purimena ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ akusalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh04t0:88_29: saddassa phalapariyāyabhāve pana nissandavipākena aniṭṭharūpenapi dukkhavipākatā yojetabbā.
tika-abh04t0:88_30: Vipākadhammatāpaṭisedhavasena abyākatānaṃ avipākalakkhaṇāti lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti tadatthaṃ dassento “avipākārahasabhāvā”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:89_1: catūhi dukesu yathākkamaṃ cha cattāro atthā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:89_2: Chakkabhāvo na bhavissatīti etena catukkabhāvābhāvo dassitanayattā coditoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:89_4: nanu tīhi dhammasaddehi vuccamāno sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthena abhinno eva so atthoti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:89_13: evaṃ jātiādibhedena bhinnānampi tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvinnañca atthānaṃ dhamma-
tika-abh04t0:90_2: kā no hānīti kadāci vadeyyāti āsaṅkāya āha “pubbā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:90_4: So cāti sabhāvadhāraṇapaccayadhariyamānatāsaṅkhāto attho na sakkā vattunti yathāvuttassa abhāvassa apekkhāvuttitāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:90_5: Na hi apekkhāvuttino antarena apekkhitabbaṃ labhanti.
tika-abh04t0:90_6: Satipi sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthasāmaññe kusalajātiādivisiṭṭhasseva tassa idha adhippetattā ekatthatā na anuññātāti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:90_8: Atha vātiādinā tiṇṇaṃ dhammasaddānaṃ abhāvattaṃ asampaṭicchanto nānatthatābhāvadosaṃ pariharati.
tika-abh04t0:91_0: Ñāpakahetubhāvato upapatti idha kāraṇanti vuttāti āha “kāraṇaṃ nāma yuttī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:91_1: Punaruttītiādinā nanu “kusalādīnampi ekattaṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttattā ekattāpattipi vattabbāti?
tika-abh04t0:91_3: sā pana abhāvāpattiyaṃ eva antogadhā nānattābhāvacodanāsāmaññena.
tika-abh04t0:91_4: Bhedābhedanibandhanattā visesanavisesitabbabhāvassa so accantamabhinnesu niyamena natthīti visesanavisesitabbābhāvena accantābhedaṃ dasseti,
tika-abh04t0:91_6: Atha vā accantaṃ abhinnesu avivaṭasaddatthavivaraṇatthaṃ pavattā. Kasmā?
tika-abh04t0:92_1: saddo hi uppalasaddasamāyogo rattuppalasetuppalādiuppalajātisāmaññato vinivattetvā nīlaguṇayuttameva uppalajātivisesaṃ joteti. Uppala-
tika-abh04t0:92_6: Tāya tāya anumatiyāti tena tena saṅketena.
tika-abh04t0:92_7: Te te vohārāti accantaṃ abhinne atthe pariyāyabhāvena accantaṃ bhinne yathāsakaṃ atthavivaraṇabhāvena
tika-abh04t0:92_8: bhedābhedavante visesanavisesitabbabhāvena tā tā samaññā paññattiyo siddhāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:92_11: Abhidhānatthopi hi anavajjasukhavipākādiabhidheyyattho viya sabhāvadhāraṇādisāmaññatthaṃ visesetīti.
tika-abh04t0:93_0: Etthāha “kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ tikā eva paṭhamaṃ vuttā, na dukā,
tika-abh04t0:93_3: sukhaggahaṇato appabhedato ca tikā eva paṭhamaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:93_4: Yasmā tikehi bodhite kusalādibhede tabbibhāgabhinnā hetuādayo vuccamānā suviññeyyā honti.
tika-abh04t0:93_5: Tathā hi “tayo kusalahetū”tiādinā kusalādimukhena hetuādayo vibhattā,
tika-abh04t0:94_0: Tesu pana sabbasaṅgahaasaṅkaraādikalyāṇabhāvena paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:94_5: tesu pana anavajjasāvajjadhammā na asaṅkarato vuttā yathā kusalattike.
tika-abh04t0:94_6: Nanu ca saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikattikādīsupi te asaṅkarato vuttāti? Evametaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:94_7: te pana akalyāṇabhūte pāpadhamme ādiṃ katvā vuttā,
tika-abh04t0:94_9: Ayaṃ pana kalyāṇabhūte pujjabhavaparinibbutinipphādake puññadhamme ādiṃ katvā vutto.
tika-abh04t0:94_10: Iti bhagavā saṇhasukhumaṃ rūpārūpadesanaṃ ārabhanto sabbasaṅgahaasaṅkaraādikalyāṇaguṇayogato paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ deseti,
tika-abh04t0:94_12: Tathā hi kusalattikamukhena “kāmāvacarakusalato cattāro somanassasahagatacittuppādā”tiādinā vedanāttikādayo vibhattāti.
tika-abh04t0:95_0: Kusalattikepi ca padhānapāsaṃsaubhayahitabhāvato kusalā dhammā paṭhamaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:95_1: Kusalā hi dhammā sukhavipākattā sabbasaṅkhatadhammānaṃ uttamā avajjavidhamanato viññuppasatthā idhalokaparalokesu atthāvahā nissaraṇāvahā ca,
tika-abh04t0:95_8: kusalesu patiṭṭhāya paṇḍitā akusale pajahantā abyākatadhammabhūtamaggaphalaṃ nibbānañca sacchikarontīti
tika-abh04t0:95_9: iminā vā paṭipattikkamena ayamanupubbī ṭhapitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:96_0: Kasmā panettha sekkhattikādīsu viya sarūpato purimapadadvayapaṭikkhepavasena tatiyapadaṃ na vuttaṃ “nevakusalā nākusalā”ti?
tika-abh04t0:96_2: Yathā hi sekkhāsekkhasabhāvesu dhammesu kocipi dhammo tadubhayasabhāvena kenacipi pariyāyena kadāci abyākaraṇīyo
tika-abh04t0:96_3: nāma natthīti sekkhattike padadvayapaṭikkhepavasena “nevasekkhā nāsekkhā”tveva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:96_5: Idha pana kusalasabhāvā eva dhammā aggaphaluppattiyā tathā na byākaraṇīyā hontīti imassa visesassa dīpanatthaṃ “abyākatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:96_6: Vacanamatte eva vā idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ “abyākatā nevakusalā nākusalā”ti byākata-
tika-abh04t0:97_9: tesaṃ pana kusalādivisese niddhārite tassa upasampādetabbatādipi atthato vuttameva hoti.
tika-abh04t0:97_10: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya “sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:97_11: kusalassa upasampadā”ti evamādivacanato hi kusalādīnaṃ upasampādanādidassanaparaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:97_12: tasmā kusalānaṃ upasampādanaṃ akusalānaṃ pahānañca upāyo,
tika-abh04t0:97_14: kusalādīnaṃ upasampādanādiatthā desanā āṇattīti ayaṃ desanāhāro.
tika-abh04t0:99_2: tadubhayaphalānaṃ anuppatti abyākatehīti yujjati avipākadhammattāti ayaṃ yutti hāro.
tika-abh04t0:101_0: Kusalaggahaṇena ye anavajjasukhavipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
tika-abh04t0:101_4: Tathā akusalaggahaṇena ye sāvajjadukkhavipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
tika-abh04t0:101_5: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā vipākadhammadhammā anupādinnupādāniyā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:101_8: Tathā abyākataggahaṇena ye avipākārahā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
tika-abh04t0:101_9: vedanāya sampayuttā vipākā dhammā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā upādinnupādāniyā anupādinnupādāniyā
tika-abh04t0:101_12: te bodhitā bhavanti abyākatalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇo hāro.
tika-abh04t0:102_1: kusalādimukhena rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā visuddhiparamparāya “kathaṃ nu kho sattā anupādisesanibbānabhāgino
tika-abh04t0:102_5: Paṭhamaṃ kusalattikassa desanā vicāritāyevāti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-abh04t0:103_4: Abyākataggahaṇena pana sakalasaṃkilesavodānapakkho yathārahamāvattatīti ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
tika-abh04t0:104_4: Abyākatā pana vipākakiriyarūpanibbānavasena catudhā bhūmisampayuttādito anekadhā ca vibhattāti ayaṃ vibhatti hāro.
tika-abh04t0:105_0: Kusalā dhammā akusalānaṃ tadaṅgādippahānāya vītikkamādippahānāya ca saṃvattanti,
tika-abh04t0:105_2: abyākatesu asaṅkhatadhātu sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇāyāti ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
tika-abh04t0:106_2: abyākatā avipākārahā nevaācayagāmī naapacayagāmīnoti pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
tika-abh04t0:107_0: Kusalādayo “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā pabhavabhūmivevacanapaññattivasena yathāsambhavaṃ pariññādipaññattivasena ca paññattāti ayaṃ paññatti hāro.
tika-abh04t0:108_0: Akusalānaṃ kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ salanaṃ kusānaṃ viya kusānaṃ vā rāgādīnaṃ lavanaṃ evaṃdhammatāti ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena avataraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:108_1: tathā kusena lātabbā kosallasambhūtā cāti paccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāya paṭiccasamuppāda…pe…
tika-abh04t0:108_3: paccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāya vā ādiantavantā aniccantikā cāti aniccatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:108_4: aniccatā eva udayabbayapaṭipīḷitatāya dukkhāti dukkhatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:108_6: evaṃ kusalāti cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni dve dhātuyotiādinā khandhāyatanadhātādimukhenapi avataraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:108_7: Iminā nayena akusalābyākatesupi avataraṇaṃ dassetabbanti ayaṃ avataraṇo hāro.
tika-abh04t0:109_4: dhammāti pana padasuddhi ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
tika-abh04t0:110_4: Akusalā dhammātiādīsupi eseva nayoti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-abh04t0:111_0: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ navamo khaṇo cattāri ca sampatticakkāni yonisomanasikāro eva vā hetu,
tika-abh04t0:111_2: kusalākusalā dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetūti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-abh04t0:112_4: Tena pariññeyyappahānabhāvanāsacchikaraṇāni dīpitānīti tadaṅgādivītikkamādippahānāni lokiyalokuttarā ca bhāvanā dassitāti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-abh04t0:113_3: tasmā kusalaggahaṇena visesato sādhiṭṭhāno samatho vipassanā ca dassitāti.
tika-abh04t0:113_4: Tathā tappaṭipakkhato akusalaggahaṇena sādhiṭṭhānā taṇhā avijjā ca,
tika-abh04t0:113_5: abyākataggahaṇena saparivārā cetovimutti paññāvimutti cāti ayaṃ nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-abh04t0:114_5: tesu ca lobhena tadekaṭṭhā akusalā dhammā.
tika-abh04t0:114_7: Abyākataggahaṇena appaṇihitānimittasuññatā nīyantīti ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-abh04t0:115_0: Tathā kusalaggahaṇena yato kosallato sambhūtā kusalā,
tika-abh04t0:115_3: Tehi ca sabbe saddhammā bodhitā bhavanti.
tika-abh04t0:115_4: Akusalaggahaṇena akosallapaṭicchāditādīnavesu kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattābhinivesabhūtā cattāro vipallāsā.
tika-abh04t0:115_5: Abyākataggahaṇena yathāvuttaindriyapaccayāni yathāvuttavipallāsappahānabhūtāni ca cattāri sāmaññaphalāni
tika-abh04t0:115_6: bodhitānīti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmīti ime tayo atthanayā.
tika-abh04t0:116_0: Tehi ca siddhehi dve kammanayāpi siddhā hontīti.
tika-abh04t0:116_1: Ayaṃ tiko sabbadhammasaṅgahitasabbabhāgiyo veditabboti idaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:118_0: Evaṃ vedanāttikādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ catusaccaniddhāraṇādividhinā soḷasa hārā pañca nayā niddisitabbā,
tika-abh04t0:118_2: Sakkā hi iminā nayena tesu tesu tikadukesu taṃtaṃhāranayayojanānurūpadhammaniddhāraṇavasena te te hāranayā viññunā niddisitunti.
tika-abh04t0:119_1: Tañca sukhindriyaṃ sukhavedanā eva hoti sāmaññassa bhedapariyādānato,
tika-abh04t0:119_3: Yasmā pana visesasāmaññāni avayavasamudāyā viya aññamaññato bhinnāni,
tika-abh04t0:119_15: Iṭṭhāsūti sukhupekkhānaṃ vipariṇāmāññāṇasaṅkhāradukkhatāya aniṭṭhabhāvopi atthīti viseseti.
tika-abh04t0:120_3: Yathākkamaṃ sukhavedanā dukkhaaniṭṭhapariyāyo hi ettha dukkha- saddoti.
tika-abh04t0:120_5: Vipākāvipākabhedāya sabbāyapi sukhavedanāya vasena lakkhaṇassa vuttattā tadubhayānukūlamatthaṃ vivaranto “sabhāvato”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:120_7: Itarā sabhāvato saṅkappato ca iṭṭhassa iṭṭhākārassa vā anubhavanalakkhaṇāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:121_0: Asamānapaccayehi ekajjhaṃ uppattito samānapaccayehi ekajjhaṃ uppatti sātisayāti ukkaṃsagativijānanavasena
tika-abh04t0:121_3: uppajjati etasmāti uppādoti duvidhopi uppādo ekuppādāti ettha ekasesanayena saṅgahitoti iminā adhippāyena “samā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:121_5: Tena tāni ekavatthukānīti etassa ca “kappentassā”tiādinā sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:121_6: Tattha purimavikappe ekaṃ vatthu nissayo etesanti yojanā,
tika-abh04t0:121_9: Dutiyavikappe pana ekaṃyeva vatthu etesu nissitanti yojanā.
tika-abh04t0:121_11: Itarathā ekaṃ vatthu etesūti samāsatthabhāvena upādārūpānampi pariggaho vattabbo siyā.
tika-abh04t0:121_16: etāni ca sampaṭicchanādīni cutiāsannāni idhādhippetānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:121_17: Tāni hi taduddhaṃ kammajarūpassa anuppattito ekasmiṃyeva hadayavatthusmiṃ vattanti,
tika-abh04t0:121_18: itarāni pana purimapurimacittakkhaṇuppanne hadayavatthusmiṃ uttaruttarāni pavattantīti.
tika-abh04t0:121_19: Chasu vā vatthūsu ekaṃ hadayavatthuyeva vatthu etesanti evaṃ pana atthe sati cutiāsannato itaresaṃ sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ siyāti ñātabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:122_2: Kismiṃ pana vuccamāne ayamanuyogo na siyā,
tika-abh04t0:122_4: Sammāsambuddhena hi kusalattikena sabbadhammānaṃ tidhā vibhāgaṃ dassetvā puna tadavayavānaṃ kusalādīnampi
tika-abh04t0:122_5: anekabhedabhinnataṃ dassentena tesaṃ vedanāsampayogavibhāgavibhāvanatthaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:122_6: Kusalā hi dhammā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
tika-abh04t0:122_8: Akusalā dhammā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā,
tika-abh04t0:122_12: Evaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ paccekaṃ vedanābhedena vibhāgadassanatthaṃ kusalattikānantaraṃ vedanāttikaṃ vatvā
tika-abh04t0:122_13: idāni sukhasampayuttādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vipākādibhedabhinnataṃ dassetuṃ vedanāttikānantaraṃ vipākattiko vutto.
tika-abh04t0:122_19: siyā vipākadhammadhammāti iminā nayena avasesattikānaṃ dukānañca tassa tassa anantaravacane payojanaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:123_1: Vipākaniruttiñca labhantīti tesu vipākasaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:123_5: saddassa phalapariyāyabhāve rūpaṃ viya na nihīno pakkaṃ viya visiṭṭho pākoti vipākoti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:123_7: Santāne sabyāpāratāti etena cittappayogasaṅkhātena kiriyābhāvena vipākadhammānaṃ santānavisesamāha “yato yasmiṃ cittuppāde kusalākusalā cetanā,
tika-abh04t0:123_9: Ettha ca “sabyāpāratā”ti etena āvajjanadvayaṃ vipākañca nivatteti,
tika-abh04t0:123_15: tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā ariyamaggacetanāya avijjāupanissayatā paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge pakāsitā.
tika-abh04t0:124_1: saddena “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko”ti iminā tikena saṅgahitaṃ gatiupadhikālapayogābhāvena avipākaṃ
tika-abh04t0:124_3: Aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ pana saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammādibhāvaṃ na bhajati.
tika-abh04t0:124_6: Ubhayampi “vipākānuppādane”ti vacanato gatiupadhikālapayogābhāvena anuppannavipākameva adhippetaṃ bhāvanāya
tika-abh04t0:124_10: saddena dassanena pahātabbassa ahosikammanti evaṃpakārasseva pariggahoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:125_3: Kesañci gotrabhupaccavekkhaṇādīnaṃ upetakiriyabhūtānaṃ taṃkattubhūtānañca atthānaṃ upetabbasambandhabhāvato
tika-abh04t0:125_5: Upetanti hi upetabbatthe vuccamāne avassaṃ upetakiriyā upetā ca ñāyatīti.
tika-abh04t0:125_7: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā,
tika-abh04t0:125_8: cetaso adhiṭṭhānā abhinivesā anusayā”tiādīsu “upayo”ti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo adhippetāti āha “upaya…pe…
tika-abh04t0:125_10: Yathāsambhavanti “ārammaṇakaraṇavasenā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaatthesu yo yo sambhavati yojetuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:125_12: Na vacanānupubbenāti “kiṃ pana taṃ upeta”ntiādinā vuttavacanānupubbena na yojetabbo.
tika-abh04t0:125_14: Nāpajjati sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato visesatthinā ca viseso anupayujjatīti taṃ pana visesaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
tika-abh04t0:126_0: Upetaṃ dīpetīti yathā “pācariyo”ti ettha pagato ācariyo pācariyoti pa-
tika-abh04t0:126_3: na cettha gatādiatthānaṃ ekantena paccattavacanayogo icchitoti.
tika-abh04t0:126_4: Atisaddo viyāti ca idaṃ sasādhanakiriyādīpanasāmaññena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:126_6: Tena sahajātassapi upādānassa saṅgaho kato hoti.
tika-abh04t0:126_7: Sahajātopi hi dhammo paccayabhūto purimanipphanno viya voharīyati yathā “ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:126_9: Dhātukathāyaṃ pakāsitanti “upapattibhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
tika-abh04t0:126_11: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahito”ti evamādiṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh04t0:126_14: Upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvānativattanato upādānehi upādātabbāti vā upādāniyā,
tika-abh04t0:127_1: Vibādhanaṃ pīḷanaṃ kilamanaṃ upatāpo pariḷāho appassaddhibhāvo.
tika-abh04t0:127_2: Vidūsitā malīnā ca yato keci akilesasabhāvāpi aniṭṭhaphalā gārayhā ca jātā.
tika-abh04t0:128_7: Sā pana vicāramariyādatā vitakkābhāvena etesaṃ jātāti avitakkaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh04t0:128_13: vitakkarahitā bhāvanāya atisukhumabhūtavicārattā īsaṃ vicārā ca avitakkavicāramattāti.
tika-abh04t0:128_14: Na hi ito paraṃ vicāro atthīti.
tika-abh04t0:128_17: Yadi vicāramattato aññesampi avitakkānaṃ atthibhāvajotanatthaṃ avitakkavacanaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:128_18: avitakkā ca vicāramattā avicārāti nivattetabbā gahetabbā ca,
tika-abh04t0:128_20: avitakkā visesitabbāti vicāramattāvitakkāti vattabbanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “visesanavisesitabbabhāvo”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:128_22: Yena yena hi pakārena dhammesu nivattetabbagahetabbabhāvā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t0:129_0: Avitakkā savitakkā ca savicārā avicārā cāti avitakkāsavicārā savitakkā avicārāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:129_2: Itarampi pakāsetunti idaṃ yathā savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko avitakkasavicāratāya “avitakkavicāramatto”ti vutto,
tika-abh04t0:129_3: evaṃ yathāvuttacittuppādesu vicāro “savitakkaavicāro”ti sakkā viññātunti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:129_4: Vitakkābhāvena ete vicāramattāti ayampi attho visesanivattiatthaṃyeva mattā-
tika-abh04t0:129_6: Vicāramattāti hi vicāramattavantoti viññāyamānattā tadaññavisesavirahasāmaññato nivattetvā vitakkavisesavirahasaṅkhāte avitakka-
tika-abh04t0:130_6: Sukhadukkhāni viya hi sukhadukkhānaṃ anantaraṃ pavattanato byavadhāyikābhūtā na tehi virujjhati,
tika-abh04t0:130_8: “Upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā”ti ayaṃ panattho idha upekkhā-
tika-abh04t0:130_12: sukhasahagatāpi na pītisahagatā evāti pītisahagatā sukhasahagatā ca aññamaññaṃ bhinnā, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:130_13: Satipi sukhasahagatānaṃ yebhuyyena pītisahagatabhāve yena sukhena samannāgatā sukhasahagatā eva honti,
tika-abh04t0:130_15: taṃ sukhaṃ nippītikasukhanti ayaṃ viseso iminā tikena dassitoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “pītisahagatāti vatvā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:131_0: Siddhoti sāvasesaṃ niravasesañca sukhapītiyo saṅgahetvā pavattehi paṭhamadutiyapadehi yo pītisahagato dhammaviseso,
tika-abh04t0:131_3: sā pītīti satipi aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhabhāve padantarasaṅgahitabhāvadīpanatosiddho ñāto viditoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:131_4: “Catutthajjhānasukhaṃ atipaṇītasukhanti oḷārikaṅgato nīharitvā tassa paṇītabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ tiko vutto”ti keci vadanti,
tika-abh04t0:131_5: tadetaṃ sabbesaṃ sukhavedanāsampayuttadhammānaṃ idha “sukhasahagatā”ti vuttattā vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:131_6: Tathā hi “sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”tiādinā “kāmāvacarakusalato cattāro somanassasahagatacittuppādā”tiādinā ca niddeso pavattoti.
tika-abh04t0:132_3: itarathā gotrabhussa dassanabhāvāpatti acodanīyā siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:132_4: Nanu ca disvā kattabbakiccakaraṇena sotāpattimaggova dassananti ukkaṃsagativijānanena nibbānassa paṭivijjhanameva
tika-abh04t0:132_5: dassananti gotrabhussa dassanabhāvāpatti na codetabbāvāti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:132_7: Tattha yadipi “paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya abhinnakālassapi bhinnakālassa viya bhedopacāradassanato bhedavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:132_8: dassanavisese pana adhippete dassanasāmaññavacanaṃ na kattabbanti dassanasāmaññamattaṃ gahetvā codanā katāti “nibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāyāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:132_11: Sā ca bahulaṃ uppattiyā hotīti āha “punappunaṃ nibbattanenā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:132_12: Tathā hi satīti “ubhayapaṭikkhepavasenā”ti padassa dassanabhāvanāpaṭikkhepavasenāti atthe sati.
tika-abh04t0:132_15: na ca añño pahāyako atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aññehī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:133_6: Ubhinnanti visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbatāya dve pahātabbahetusaddāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:133_7: Etanti “nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ atthī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:133_9: Evañca katvāti evaṃ dassanabhāvanāpadehi pahātabbahetukapadassa visuṃ visuṃ yojanato.
tika-abh04t0:133_12: Evanti dassanabhāvanāhi napahātabbo hetu etesanti evaṃ atthe sati. “Hetu…pe…
tika-abh04t0:133_13: siyā”ti etassa “purimasmiñhi atthe”tiādinā ahetukānaṃ aggahitabhāvadassanavasena atthaṃ vatvā idāni “atha
tika-abh04t0:134_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “ārammaṇaṃ katvāti etena catukiccasādhakaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ vuccatī”ti?
tika-abh04t0:134_3: Sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato ariyamaggadhammānaṃyeva ca apacayagāmibhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:134_6: Eteneva vā visesupalakkhaṇahetubhūtena vacanena yathāvutto ārammaṇakaraṇaviseso viññāyati.
tika-abh04t0:134_10: Ñāpako kārako sampāpakoti tividho hi hetu,
tika-abh04t0:134_15: na ariyamaggadhammā evāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “purimapacchimāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh04t0:134_16: Tattha ariyamaggasseva nibbānagāmipaṭipadābhāvo paribyattoti tasseva apacayagāmibhāvo yutto,
tika-abh04t0:134_18: Apacaye dukkhaparijānanādinā sātisayaṃ gamanaṃ yesante apacayagāminoti “maggā eva apacayagāmino”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:134_19: Purimapacchimānanti ca imasmiṃ tike paṭhamapadadutiyapadasaṅgahitānaṃ atthānanti attho.
tika-abh04t0:134_21: caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭha”ntiādīsu viya sānunāsiko ācaya-
tika-abh04t0:134_23: Ettha ca “ācina”nti vattabbe “ācaya”nti byattayavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:134_24: Ācayā hutvā gacchantīti etena apacinantīti apacayā,
tika-abh04t0:134_25: apacayā hutvā gacchanti pavattantīti ayamattho nayato dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:135_0: 11. Lokiyesu asekkhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbāti kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu –
tika-abh04t0:136_2: adhisīlampi sikkhati adhicittampi sikkhati adhipaññampi sikkhati.
tika-abh04t0:136_3: Sikkhatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā sekkhoti vuccati.
tika-abh04t0:136_4: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
tika-abh04t0:136_5: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati
tika-abh04t0:136_6: ‘ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī’ti,
tika-abh04t0:137_0: Vacanato yathāvuttakalyāṇaputhujjanassapi sīlādidhammā sekkhāti vuccantīti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:137_2: Nippariyāyena hi sekkhāsekkhabhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ maggaphaladhammesu evāti lokiyesu sekkhabhāvāsaṅkābhāvato asekkhabhāvānāpatti vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:137_4: Arahattaphaladhammāpi sikkhāphalabhāvena pavattanato heṭṭhimaphaladhammā viya sikkhāsu jātātiādiatthehi sekkhā siyuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:137_5: heṭṭhimaphaladhammāpi vā sikkhāphalabhāvena pavattanato arahattaphaladhammā viya asekkhāti codanaṃ manasikatvā “pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:137_9: tāni eva osadhānī”tiādīsu taṃsadisesu tabbohāro daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:137_10: Etena ca sekkhasadisā asekkhā yathā “amanusso”ti vuttaṃ hotīti aññe.
tika-abh04t0:137_12: kāro dissatīti vuddhippattā sekkhā asekkhāti ayampi attho vutto.
tika-abh04t0:138_3: Akusalaviddhaṃsanarasattā vā kusalānaṃ tattha sātisayakiccayuttataṃ parittadhammehi mahaggatānaṃ pakāsetuṃ “kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:138_6: “Vipulaṃ phalaṃ vipulaphala”nti evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne vipākesupi vipulaphalatā labbhateva.
tika-abh04t0:138_8: Mahantehi gatā paṭipannāti ayaṃ panattho tiṇṇampi sādhāraṇoti.
tika-abh04t0:138_9: Guṇato ayaṃ ettakoti sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ karontā viya pavattantīti oḷārikā kilesā “pamāṇakarā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:138_11: Satipi kehici paricchinnatte mahāpamāṇabhāvena gatā pavattāti mahaggatā.
tika-abh04t0:138_12: Paricchedakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sukhumānampi agocarabhāvato tehi na kathañcipi paricchinnā vītikkantāti aparicchinnā appamāṇā,
tika-abh04t0:139_2: Ettha ca “pamāṇakarehī”tiādiko atthavikappo “atappakatthenā”tiādikāya hīnattikapadavaṇṇanāya parato bahūsu potthakesu likhīyati,
tika-abh04t0:140_1: Lokiyasādhujanehipi atijigucchanīyesu ānantariyakammanatthikavādādīsu pavatti vinā vipallāsabalavabhāvena na hotīti “vipariyāsadaḷhatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:140_2: Etenāti “vipākadāne satī”tiādinā satipi kālaniyame vipākuppādane sāsaṅkavacanena.
tika-abh04t0:140_3: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttanayena niyatatāya atippasaṅgo dunnivāro, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:140_6: samānajātikena ca vipākānuppādanepi anantaraṃ vipākuppādanasamatthatāya avihantabbataṃ anantarikānaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:140_7: Yato tesaṃ vipākadhammatā viya sabhāvasiddhā niyatānantariyatā.
tika-abh04t0:140_9: dānatoti imināpi asamānajātikādīhi anivattanīyaphalataṃ eva vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t0:141_4: Uparatā avipaccanasabhāvāsaṅkā yesu tāni uparatāvipacca…pe… saṅkāni,
tika-abh04t0:141_8: Upatthambhakāni anubalappadāyakāni honti uppattiyā santānassa visesitattā.
tika-abh04t0:142_4: Hetubahutāvasenāti bahuhetukassa paṭhamanayassa anantaraṃ bahuhetukatāsāmaññena nikkhepakaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh04t0:142_5: tatiyaṃ vuttanayo idha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dutiyaṃ vutto.
tika-abh04t0:142_6: Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi pavattamānesu nirīhakesu dhammesu kesañci anuvattanīyabhāvo na kevalaṃ dhammasabhāvatoyeva,
tika-abh04t0:142_7: atha kho purimadhammānaṃ pavattivisesenapi hotīti āha “pubbābhisaṅkhāravasenā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:142_8: Pavattiviseso hi purimapurimānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ uttaruttaresu visesādhānaṃ bhāvanāpubbābhisaṅkhāroti.
tika-abh04t0:142_12: Yasmā panātiādinā yathāvuttaṃ atthaṃ pāṭhantarena sādheti.
tika-abh04t0:142_13: Tattha hi adhipatipaccayassa paccanīye ṭhitattā maggo adhipati maggādhipatīti ayamattho labbhatīti.
tika-abh04t0:143_2: patvā vigato cāti duvidhesu atthesu ubhayesampi vācako,
tika-abh04t0:143_9: Yo vā uppādādippatto attano ca sabhāvaṃ dhāreti paccayehi ca dhārīyati,
tika-abh04t0:143_10: so uppannadhammoti paccuppannabhāvo uppannadhammabhāvoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:143_11: Uppannadhamme vatvā “anuppannā”ti vacanaṃ na yathādhigatapaṭisedhananti kathamidaṃ paccetabbanti āha “yadi hī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:143_14: nibbānaṃ viya tepi navattabbāti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh04t0:143_17: Ayaṃ pana tiko dvinnaṃ addhānaṃ vasena pūretvā dassitoti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhatīti.
tika-abh04t0:143_18: Evaṃ sante kasmā atītā navattabbāti na vuttāti?
tika-abh04t0:143_20: Dhammavasena hi asaṅgahitaṃ nibbānaṃ tattha navattabbaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:143_21: na ca niyogato atītā nāma dhammā keci atthi,
tika-abh04t0:143_23: Phalanibbattito kāraṇassa puretaraṃ nibbatti idha pariniṭṭhitasaddena vuccati,
tika-abh04t0:143_24: na tassa hutvā vigatabhāvoti āha “anāgate vā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:144_1: Yassa jhānā vuṭṭhahitvātiādinā “tenānandā”tiādipāḷiyā heṭṭhāpāḷiṃ atthavasena dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:145_1: bhikkhu ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapeti sannisādeti ekodiṃ karoti samādahati.
tika-abh04t0:145_8: tassa ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasikaroto suññatāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe… muccati.
tika-abh04t0:145_10: bhikkhu evaṃ sampajānāti ajjhattaṃ kho me suññataṃ manasikaroto ajjhattaṃ suññatāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe…
tika-abh04t0:145_16: tassa āneñjaṃ manasikaroto āneñjāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati…pe…
tika-abh04t0:146_0: Tattha ajjhattasuññatādīsūti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā ca suññatāya āneñje ca.
tika-abh04t0:146_2: Apaguṇapādakajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa hi ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasikaroto tattha cittaṃ na pakkhandati.
tika-abh04t0:146_3: Tato “parassa santāne nu kho katha”nti bahiddhā manasi karoti,
tika-abh04t0:146_6: kālena parassa santāne nu kho katha”nti ajjhattabahiddhā manasi karoti,
tika-abh04t0:146_8: Tato ubhatobhāgavimutto hotukāmo “arūpasamāpattiyaṃ nu kho katha”nti āneñjaṃ manasi karoti,
tika-abh04t0:146_10: “Idāni me cittaṃ na pakkhandatī”ti vissaṭṭhavīriyena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:146_11: pādakajjhānameva pana sādhukaṃ punappunaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:146_12: evamassa rukkhaṃ chindato pharasumhi avahante punappunaṃ nisitanisitaṃ kāretvā chindantassa chijje pharasu
tika-abh04t0:146_13: viya kammaṭṭhāne manasikāro vahatīti dassetuṃ “tasmiṃyevā”tiādi vuttanti.
tika-abh04t0:147_0: Atthato ca asamānattāti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:147_3: te sabbe dassetvā idhādhippetatthaniddhāraṇatthaṃ atthuddhāravasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:147_8: saddassa cakkhādīnaṃ ajjhattabhāvavibhāvanasabbhāvato idha udāharaṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:147_9: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ajjhattikaduke “ajjhattāva ajjhattikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:147_10: Evañca sati na ettha saddato asamānatāpi siyā,
tika-abh04t0:147_13: Taṃvācakassāti ajjhattajjhattavācakassa sakkā vattuṃ tadatthassa ajjhattabhāvasabbhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:148_1: bhikkhu sobhati saṅgaṇikārāmo saṅgaṇikārato saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto”tiādinā pabbajitāsāruppassa nekkhammasukhādinikāmalābhitāya
tika-abh04t0:148_4: yattha rattassa yathābhiratassa rūpassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na uppajjeyyuṃ sokapari…pe…
tika-abh04t0:148_5: upāyāsā”ti evaṃ rūpādiratiyā ca ādīnavaṃ vatvā sace koci duppaññajātiko pabbajito vadeyya “sammāsambuddho
tika-abh04t0:148_6: khette paviṭṭhā gāviyo viya amheyeva gaṇato nīharati,
tika-abh04t0:148_9: tassa vacanokāsupacchedanatthaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya majjhe nisinnopi tathāgato ekakovāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t0:149_3: apissu maṃ ekameko evaṃ maññati ‘mamevārabbha samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī’ti.
tika-abh04t0:149_7: Yāvadeva viññāpanatthāya tathāgato paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti.
tika-abh04t0:149_10: tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi,
tika-abh04t0:151_1: Aññehi anidassanehi aññaṃ viya katvā yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-abh04t0:151_2: Dhammasabhāvasāmaññenātiādinā kiñcāpi rūpāyatanato añño nidassanabhāvo nāma natthi,
tika-abh04t0:151_4: Tato ca rūpāyatanassa viseso nidassanabhāvena katoti tadaññadhammavisesakaro nidassanabhāvo rūpāyatanato anaññopi añño viya katvā upacaritoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:151_11: Byāpārādīti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena akkhipaṭalādīnaṃ heṭṭhā upari ca saṃsīdanalaṅghanādippavattimāha.
tika-abh04t0:151_13: visayassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvena anuggaho upaghāto cāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:154_3: Atha vā samānadesānaṃ ekavatthukattā samānagahetabbabhāvānaṃ ekuppāditoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:154_7: so sahajātādīhi hetūhi katoti katvā vuttaṃ “samā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:154_10: Ekībhāvūpagamananti ekakalāpabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ saṃsaṭṭhatāya samūhaghanabhāvena duviññeyyanānākaraṇataṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:154_15: Teneva “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:154_17: Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ yehi pakāravisesehi dhammānaṃ vibhāvane kate paṭivedho hoti,
tika-abh04t0:154_19: Yesaṃ pana yena ekeneva pakārena vibhāvane paṭivedho hoti,
tika-abh04t0:154_20: tesampi taṃ vatvā dhammissarattā tadaññaniravasesappakāravibhāvanañca desanāvilāsoti āha “desetabbappakārajānana”ntiādi.
tika-abh04t0:154_21: Nanu ekena pakārena jānantassa tadaññappakāravibhāvanaṃ aphalaṃ hotīti?
tika-abh04t0:154_25: Iminā dhammānaṃ vijjamānasseva pakāravisesassa vibhāvanaṃ desanāvilāsoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:155_0: Aññatthāpīti “ahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū”tiādīsu.
tika-abh04t0:155_1: Yathā paṭhamadukekadese gahetvā dutiyatatiyadukehi saddhiṃ chaṭṭhadukanaye yojanā “hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī”tiādayo tayo dukā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t0:155_2: evaṃ dutiyatatiyadukekadese gahetvā paṭhamadukena saddhiṃ yojanāya “sahetukā dhammā hetūpi na hetūpi,
tika-abh04t0:155_5: hetuvippayuttā dhammā hetūpi na hetūpī”ti cattāro dukā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t0:155_6: te pana vuttanayeneva sakkā dassetunti na dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:155_7: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ vuttehi catutthapañcamehi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitehi purimehi dvīhi ninnānākaraṇato ete na vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:155_9: Teneva hi ninnānatthattā pāḷiyaṃ āgatadukesu yathāniddhāritadukānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ avarodhanena avuttataṃ dassetuṃ “etesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:156_0: Atha vā “etena vā gatidassanenā”tiādinā vakkhamānanayena “hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā cā”tiādīnaṃ sambhavantānaṃ
tika-abh04t0:156_1: dukānaṃ saṅgahe sati etesampi saṅgaho siyā.
tika-abh04t0:156_2: Yato vā dukato padaṃ niddhāretvā dukantaraṃ vuccati,
tika-abh04t0:156_3: tena sati ca nānatte dukantaraṃ labbhati,
tika-abh04t0:156_4: na cettha koci viseso yathāvuttadukehīti saṃvaṇṇanāsu na dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:156_8: Evaṃ santepi sahetukahetusahetukaduke vatvā itarepi vuttā,
tika-abh04t0:156_22: na hetusahagatāpī”tiādīnañca sambhavantānaṃ anekesaṃ dukānaṃ saṅgaho anuññāto viya dissati.
tika-abh04t0:156_25: Dhammānaṃ vā sabhāvakiccādiṃ bodhetabbākārañca yāthāvato jānantena dhammasāminā yattakā dukā vuttā,
tika-abh04t0:156_27: Addhā hi te dukā na vattabbā,
tika-abh04t0:156_31: Yadi dukantarehi dukantarapadehi ca samānatthattā etesaṃ dukānaṃ dukantarapadānañca avacanaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:156_32: evaṃ sati chaṭṭhaduke paṭhamapadampi na vattabbaṃ catutthaduke dutiyapadena samānatthattā.
tika-abh04t0:156_33: Tathā ca chaṭṭhadukoyeva na hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “catutthaduke”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:156_36: Atthantaratābhāvepi pakārabhedahetukaṃ dukantaravacananti dassito hi ayamatthoti.
tika-abh04t0:156_43: Paṭhamadukapakkhepena dassito pāḷiyaṃ chaṭṭhadukena itaratra ca itaradukehīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:157_2: atthitanti etena na paṭiladdhattatāsaṅkhātā sasabhāvatāva atthitā,
tika-abh04t0:157_3: atha kho paṭipakkhena anirodho appahīnatā anipphāditaphalatā kāraṇāsamugghātena phalanibbattanārahatā cāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:157_4: Tathā hi “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti ettha “satī”ti iminā vacanena yena vinā yaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh04t0:157_8: dīpeti samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhatanti.
tika-abh04t0:157_9: Ayametesaṃ visesoti ayaṃ paccayanibbattānaṃ paccayavantatā anekapaccayanipphāditatā ca dukadvaye purimapadatthānaṃ bhedo,
tika-abh04t0:157_11: ṭhapanatoti “ettakā”ti pabhedaparicchedaniddhāraṇavasena abhidhammamātikāyaṃ dhammānaṃ avuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:157_12: Suttantamātikāyaṃ pana niddhāritasarūpasaṅkhāvisesattā vinicchitatthaparicchedāyeva avijjādayo vuttāti.
tika-abh04t0:157_13: “Pathavīādi rūpa”nti etasmiṃ atthavikappe anekahetukesu cittuppādesu hetūnaṃ sahetukabhāvo viya sabbesaṃ
tika-abh04t0:157_16: Na hi tesu niyato katthaci saṃsāmibhāvoti.
tika-abh04t0:157_17: Aniccānupassanāya vā lujjati chijjati vinassatīti gahetabbo lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
tika-abh04t0:158_2: “avuttopi yathālābhavasena veditabbo”ti ca vakkhatīti dukabahutā icchitā evāti?
tika-abh04t0:158_8: tathā mahākiriyato manodvārāvajjananti evaṃpakārānaṃ sabbadhammārammaṇaviññāṇānaṃ anāmasanato na byāpinīti dasseti “dukabahutā”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:158_11: Niddesena ca viruddhanti “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā,
tika-abh04t0:158_12: na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”tiādinā rūpāyatanādīnaṃ paccekacakkhuviññāṇādinā kenaci viññeyyataṃ,
tika-abh04t0:158_13: sotaviññāṇādinā kenaci naviññeyyatañca dassentena nikkheparāsiniddesena “dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:158_14: tathā atthuddhāraniddesenapi atthato na sametīti attho.
tika-abh04t0:158_16: Yo ca paṭisedho kato atthanānattato dukaṃ dassetunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:158_19: na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”ti ettakesu niddesapadesu dukapadadvayappavatti pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:159_1: saddānaṃ aniyamato cakkhusotādinissayavohārena cakkhusotaviññāṇādiko bhinnasabhāvoyeva dhammo atthoti dassanavasena.
tika-abh04t0:159_2: Rūpāyatanameva hi cakkhusotaviññāṇehi viññeyyāviññeyyabhāvato “kenaci viññeyyaṃ kenaci naviññeyya”nti ca vuccatīti.
tika-abh04t0:159_3: Yadi evaṃ imasmimpi pakkhe dukabahutā āpajjatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “na cetthā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:159_11: Evañca satītiādinā imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya laddhaguṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:159_13: na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā”ti rūpāyatanasseva vuttattā atthabhedābhāvato kathamayaṃ duko hotīti āha “viññāṇanānattenā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:160_0: Ettha pana yathā viññāṇanānattena viññātabbaṃ bhinditvā duke vuccamāne satipi viññātabbānaṃ bahubhāve yattakā viññātabbā,
tika-abh04t0:160_1: tattakā dukāti natthi dukabahutā dukasaṅgahitadhammekadesesu dukapadadvayappavattidassanabhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:160_2: Evaṃ dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattena duke vuccamānepi yattakāni viññāṇāni,
tika-abh04t0:160_5: Na hi ekaṃyeva viññāṇaṃ “kenaci kenacī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:160_6: kintu aparampīti sabbaviññāṇasaṅgahe duko samatto hoti,
tika-abh04t0:160_7: na ca katthaci dukassa pacchedo atthi indriyaviññāṇānaṃ viya manoviññāṇassapi visayassa bhinnattā.
tika-abh04t0:160_8: Na hi atītārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ anāgatādiārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh04t0:160_10: tasmā yathāladdhavisesena visiṭṭhesu manoviññāṇabhedesu tassa tassa visayassa ālambanānālambanavasena dukapadadvayappavatti na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:160_11: Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyañceva aviññeyyañcāti ayamattho atthi,
tika-abh04t0:160_12: tasmā so avuttopi yathālābhavasena veditabbo”ti bhūmibhedavasena yathālābhaṃ dassessati.
tika-abh04t0:160_14: Pāḷi pana indriyaviññāṇehi nayadassanavasena āgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:160_15: Evañca katvā imissāpi atthavaṇṇanāya “kenacī”ti padaṃ aniyamena sabbaviññāṇasaṅgāhakanti siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh04t0:160_19: Kiñca “ye vā panā”ti padantarasampiṇḍanatopi “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:160_20: na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā”ti ettāvatā dukapadadvayappavatti dassitāti viññāyati.
tika-abh04t0:160_29: na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā”ti pāḷi abhavissa.
tika-abh04t0:160_30: Yaṃ pana vadanti “ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:160_31: na te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyāti iminā atthato dve dukā vuttā hontī”ti,
tika-abh04t0:160_34: Etena pāḷipaṭisedhanañca nivāritaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ paṭisedhanasseva abhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:160_35: Tathā yassa ārammaṇassa vijānanabhāvena yo attho vuccamāno aniyamadassanatthaṃ “kenacī”ti vutto,
tika-abh04t0:160_36: soyeva tato aññassa avijānanabhāvena vuccamāno aniyamadassanatthaṃ puna “kenacī”ti vuttoti tadatthadassane
tika-abh04t0:160_37: tenevāti ayaṃ padattho na sambhavatīti na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh04t0:161_1: Santānassa ajaññamalīnabhāvakaraṇato kaṇhakammavipākahetuto ca aparisuddhattā “asucibhāvena sandantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:161_4: saddoti etena āsavo viya āsavoti ayampi attho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:161_6: vuttānīti etena gotrabhuggahaṇaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ yathā “kākehi sappi rakkhitabba”nti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:161_7: Gotrabhusadisā gotrabhūti pana atthe sati guṇappadhānatthānaṃ ekena saddena avacanīyattā vodānādayova vuttā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:161_8: Atha vā gotrabhūti ekasesena sāmaññena vā ayaṃ niddesoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:162_3: na evaṃ sāsavāti vuttadhammānaṃ sampayuttehi āsavehi sāsavatā,
tika-abh04t0:162_6: Yadi evaṃ hetugocchake kathanti āha “hetugocchake panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:162_7: Paṭhame duke dutiyassa pakkhepe ekoti catutthadukamāha.
tika-abh04t0:162_8: Paṭhame duke tatiyassa pakkhepe dveti “āsavā ceva dhammā āsavavippayuttā ca,
tika-abh04t0:162_9: āsavavippayuttā ceva dhammā no ca āsavā”ti iminā saddhiṃ pañcamadukamāha.
tika-abh04t0:162_10: Paṭhamassa dutiye duke pakkhepe ekoti “no āsavā dhammā sāsavāpi anāsavāpī”ti ayameko.
tika-abh04t0:162_11: Tatiye paṭhamassa pakkhepe dveti “āsavā dhammā āsavasampayuttāpi āsavavippayuttāpi,
tika-abh04t0:162_12: no āsavādhammā āsavasampayuttāpi āsavavippayuttāpī”ti ime dve.
tika-abh04t0:162_13: Tatiye dutiyassa pakkhepe ekoti “sāsavā dhammā āsavasampayuttāpi āsavavippayuttāpī”ti eko.
tika-abh04t0:162_23: Āsavavippayuttā dhammā āsavāpi no āsavāpī”ti etesampi,
tika-abh04t0:162_24: “āsavasahagatā dhammā no āsavasahagatā dhammā”ti evamādīnañca aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ gahaṇanayo ca pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:163_0: Esa nayoti yo esa paṭhamaduke dutiyadukapakkhepādiko upāyo idha āsavagocchake vutto,
tika-abh04t0:163_2: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ anāgatadukā saṃyojanagocchake tāva “saṃyojanā ceva dhammā saṃyojanavippayuttā ca,
tika-abh04t0:163_3: saṃyojanavippayuttā ceva dhammā no ca saṃyojanā,
tika-abh04t0:163_9: Nīvaraṇagocchake pana nīvaraṇānaṃ nīvaraṇavippayuttabhāvābhāvato “no nīvaraṇā dhammā nīvaraṇiyāpi anīvaraṇiyāpi,
