tika-abh04t0:394_1: Musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma kiṃ vakkhamānaṃ kiriyaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:395_2: Kuhanavatthūnīti pāpicchataṃ nissāya lūkhacīvarādisevanavasena “yo te vihāre vasati,
tika-abh04t0:395_3: so arahā”tiādinā attānaṃ ariyaguṇasāmantaṃ katvā bhaṇanavasena visesalābhino viya attano pariharaṇavasena
tika-abh04t0:395_4: ca pavattā akusalacittuppādā paresaṃ vimhāpanakāraṇāni kuhanavatthūni.
tika-abh04t0:396_1: Satipi saguṇārammaṇehi maggassa animittanāmalābhe na nippariyāyena vipassanā animittanāmikāti āgamanato
tika-abh04t0:396_2: maggo animittanāmaṃ na labhatīti āha “na pana saguṇārammaṇehi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:396_4: Yasmā pana āgamanato suññataṃ appaṇihitanti laddhanāmassa maggassa saguṇato ārammaṇato ca taṃnāmābhāvo na kadācipi atthi,
tika-abh04t0:397_1: Nimittadhammā saṅkhārā tehi sanimittā saviggahā viya upaṭṭhahantīti tesaṃ abhāvitabhāvanassa bhāvitabhāvanassa
tika-abh04t0:397_3: Tena ca “vimokkhena saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:397_8: nanu ca aniccānupassanāya animittavimokkhabhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyadesanāya tassā animittabhāvābhāvo atthi eva,
tika-abh04t0:397_9: evañca sati “animittassa animittanāmadānābhāvo”ti ca na na sakkā vattunti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati,
tika-abh04t0:397_10: tathā animittena maggassa animittabhāvo na yujjatiyeva.
tika-abh04t0:397_13: pariyāyasiddhaṃyeva pana aniccānupassanāya animittabhāvaṃ gahetvā maggasodhanavasenāyamanuyogo kato “animittavimokkhassa
tika-abh04t0:397_18: Na maggādhipatīti maggo adhipati maggādhipatīti chandacittānaṃ ayaṃ samaññā natthīti attho.
tika-abh04t0:397_19: Na ca tehi maggassāti chandacittehi maggo adhipati etassāti maggādhipatīti ayaṃ samaññā maggassa natthi. Kasmā?
tika-abh04t0:398_0: Jhānassa suññatādināmakattāti etena indriyabalādīnampi maggasampayogato suññatādināmakatā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:398_1: Satipi paccanīkāmasane na tassa maggassa taṃ paribyattaṃ yathā sarasatāti āha “sarasappadhāno”ti.
tika-abh04t0:398_4: Tasmāti yasmā sarasatova nāmalābhe avavatthānāpatti sabbassa maggassa sabbanāmabhāvāpatti hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:398_6: maggāti tena āgamanato nāmalābhassa paccanīkato nāmalābhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:398_10: Suññatāppaṇihitasseva maggassa vuttattā aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo idha asaṅgahito siyāti āsaṅkitvā āha “aniccānupassanā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:399_0: Ākāravantesu gahitesu tadākāropi gahitoyeva hotīti āha “lakkhaṇānipi paṭividdhāni honti tadākārasaṅkhāraggahaṇato”ti.
tika-abh04t0:402_0: Pañcadhā uddisati pañcupādānakkhandhe ajjhattadukavasena rūpadukavasena ca bhinditvā abhinditvā ca nimittavacaneneva
tika-abh04t0:402_2: Teneva upādinnānupādinnavasena pavattaṃ dvidhā katvā niddisitvāpi “ayaṃ tāva nimitte vinicchayo”ti nimittavaseneva nigameti.
tika-abh04t0:402_10: yathā maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijjhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte
tika-abh04t0:402_11: pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca tabbasena ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ visesoti tesaṃ niyame āsannakāraṇaṃ padhānakāraṇañca
tika-abh04t0:403_0: Idāni apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakānaṃ pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārapaṭhamajjhānāni sammasitvā nibbattitānañca maggānaṃ
tika-abh04t0:403_1: ekantena paṭhamajjhānikabhāvato vipassanāniyamoyevettha ekantiko padhānañcāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “vipassanāniyamenevā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:403_4: pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa jhānaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hotīti “pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:403_6: evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtena sammasitajjhānena ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena āhitavisesā vipassanā niyametīti āha “evaṃ sesavādesupi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:406_0: Catutthajjhānikassa maggassa āruppe arūpajjhānameva pādakaṃ siyāti āha “catutthajjhānikavajjāna”nti.
tika-abh04t0:406_3: “Taṃtaṃvādehi paññāpiyamānāni pādakajjhānādīni vādasahacāritāya ‘vādā’ti vuccantī”ti adhippāyena “tayopete vāde”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:406_4: Vadanti etehīti vā vādakaraṇabhūtāni pādakajjhānādīni vādā.
tika-abh04t0:407_1: susaṅkhatattāti etena yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh04t0:407_2: tattha uppajjamānameva kiñci visesādhānaṃ karotīti dīpeti.
tika-abh04t0:408_0: Purimānulomaṃ viya tanti yathā gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomato purimaanulomañāṇaṃ taṃ gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomaṃ anubandhati, evaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:408_1: Tadapīti gotrabhuṭṭhāne uppannānulomañāṇampi aññaṃ anulomañāṇameva anubandheyya,
tika-abh04t0:408_3: Sā bhūmīti sā pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātā kilesānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya bhūmi.
tika-abh04t0:408_4: Eko bhavoti gahetvā vuttanti etena satta bhave dve bhaveti idampi adhippāyavasena netabbatthaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:408_7: ekavāraṃ kāmāvacaradevesu ekavāraṃ manussesūti evampi missitūpapattivasena tesu ekissā eva upapattiyā ayaṃ paricchedo.
tika-abh04t0:408_8: Yaṃ pana “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:408_11: Tathā “ṭhapetvā dve bhave”ti etthāpi kāmāvacaradevamanussabhavānaṃ missakavaseneva,
tika-abh04t0:408_12: tasmā kāmadhātuyaṃ ye dve bhavāti kāmāvacaradevamanussavasena ye dve bhavāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:408_13: Purimavikappesu puggalabhedena paṭipadā bhinditvā kassaci calatīti,
tika-abh04t0:408_14: kassaci na calatīti katvā “calati evā”ti avadhāraṇamantarena attho vutto.
tika-abh04t0:408_17: tasmā sabbesampi paṭipadāsu abhedena gahitāsu ekantena calanaṃ sambhavatīti “calaticceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:408_18: na na calatī”ti tatiyavikappo calanāvadhāraṇo vutto.
tika-abh04t0:411_2: visesato pubbabhāge “jhānaṃ bhāvemi maggaṃ bhāvemī”ti pavattajjhāsayā hontīti adhippāyena “yassa pubbabhāge”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:412_8: Kiñcāpi hi saddhādayopi indriyapaccayatāya sampayuttehi anuvattayanti,
tika-abh04t0:412_9: ekasmiṃ pana cittuppāde samadhurena aññena vinā sampayuttehi anuvattanīyabhāvo na tesaṃ yathā chandādīnanti teyeva adhipatibhāvena vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:412_10: Evañca katvā indriyasahajātādhipatipaccayānaṃ viseso paribyatto hoti.
tika-abh04t0:414_2: Tathā hi so adhipati viya aññādhipatinā diṭṭhiyā saha nappavattatīti.
tika-abh04t0:414_6: itarathā sūriyatthaṅgamane andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya aggamaggatirodhāne saccapaṭicchādakatamappavatti āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:414_10: Na upamāya vuttattāti imasmiṃ sutte na upamāya vuttabhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:414_11: Yathāvuttanayenāti vā etasmiṃ sutte vuttappakārena nayena imissā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upamāya na vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:419_1: Khaṇattayassa akusalesu asambhavato samavāyakālahetusamūhattho samaya- saddo.
tika-abh04t0:419_2: Lobhābhibhūtāya eva iṭṭhārammaṇasmiṃ itaratra ca iṭṭhākāraggahaṇavasena somanassasahagatabhāvoti evamādiṃ sandhāya “yathānurūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:419_11: yathāvuttapadaṭṭhānamevā”ti ca evamādinā vuttanayena anugantabbatāya vuttaṃ “vuttanayaṃ anugantvā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:420_0: Gataṃ gamanaṃ pavattīti katvā vuttaṃ “gatamattaṃ gatimattaṃ gahaṇamatta”nti.
tika-abh04t0:420_3: yonisomanasikāro viya hi kusalassa ayonisomanasikāro akusalassa accāsannahetu.
tika-abh04t0:420_4: Tathā hi satipi asaddhammasavanādikāraṇe ayoniso anāvajjite avavatthāpite ca natthi akusalappavatti.
tika-abh04t0:420_8: Tena satisaṃvaroti idha khantisaṃvaro vuttoti adhippāyo indriyasaṃvarassa vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:420_10: So hi “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti pajahatī”tiādinā vuttoti.
tika-abh04t0:421_1: Tena hi nivutā na sammā paṭipajjanti.
tika-abh04t0:422_2: Diṭṭhisahitassa pana diṭṭhiyā anuvidhāyakattā taggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti.
tika-abh04t0:422_11: Rāgādīnaṃ pariyuṭṭhānādisabhāvatāya “avisesenā”ti vuttaṃ visesassa ekaccassa asambhavato. Idhāti,
tika-abh04t0:422_13: Nipphādetabbe payojane bhummaṃ “cammasmiṃ dīpinaṃ hantī”ti viya ārammaṇaṃ vā avūpasamo phalūpacārena “semho guḷo”ti viya.
tika-abh04t0:425_1: Sabhāvapaṭicchādavasena pakatiattādiasantaggahaṇassa nissayattā nimittattā asantaṃ bujjhati,
tika-abh04t0:425_2: niccādivisamaggahaṇassa saññādivipariyesassa nissayattā asamaṃ bujjhatīti moho vutto nimittassa kattubhāvena upacāritattā,
tika-abh04t0:427_1: Apaṇṇakapadaṃ viya avirajjhanakapadampi kadāci niyatabhāvaṃ dīpeyyāti aniyatataṃ dīpetuṃ “uppattiarahaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ mānassa aniyatattā.
tika-abh04t0:427_5: Evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā,
tika-abh04t0:427_8: evañca saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā,
tika-abh04t0:427_9: na dasavidhā dassitāti yathāvuttāhi yojanāhi mānassa aniyatabhāvo pakāsito.
tika-abh04t0:427_10: Atha vā mānena saddhiṃ pañca honti yathāvuttāni apaṇṇakaṅgāni,
tika-abh04t0:427_11: kiṃ pana hontīti apekkhāyaṃ yevāpanakāti viditovāyamattho.
tika-abh04t0:427_15: Kilesaduke paṭiccavārādīsu “kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”tiādīsu “lobhaṃ
tika-abh04t0:427_16: paṭicca moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:427_17: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho māno uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:427_18: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:427_19: Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappa”nti vibhattattā “tathā kilesadukepī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:428_3: tathā vicikicchā bhavarāgoti uddisitvā kāmarāgo mānasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva
tika-abh04t0:428_4: ca saddhiṃ māno bhavarāgāvijjāsaṃyojanehi saddhiṃ bhavarāgo avijjāsaṃyojanena saddhi”nti aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-abh04t0:428_8: tathā moho”ti uddisitvā “lobho asaṅkhāriko diṭṭhivippayutto mohauddhaccaahirikānottappehi,
tika-abh04t0:428_11: sasaṅkhāriko eva ca mohamānathinauddhaccaahirikaanottappehī”ti vakkhamānattā “tathādasavidhā kilesāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:430_0: 402. Ussāhaṃ janentāti ettha cittapayogasaṅkhāto saṅkhāro eva ussāho, na vīriyussāhoti.
tika-abh04t0:432_6: tassa amittassa sampatti yebhuyyena paṭighuppattihetu hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:435_0: 424. Nicchayābhāvāti adhimokkhābhāvā. Asaṇṭhahanatoti santānavasena ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-abh04t0:438_2: Etena ca dassanena pahātabbesu abhāvavacanena kāraṇasiddhiyā phalasiddhīti tattha abhāvassa kāraṇameva
tika-abh04t0:438_4: Tena taṃsabhāvatā tassa cittuppādassa vuttā hoti.
tika-abh04t0:438_8: na tassa balavabhāvo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane kāraṇanti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-abh04t0:438_13: tasmā nāgata”nti vuttattā “anākaḍḍhanato anāgamanaṃ sādhetu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:439_2: Paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane sati uddhaccasahagataṃ ekantena apāyagamanīyaṃ siyā.
tika-abh04t0:439_3: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “itarassāpi ettheva paṭisandhidānaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:439_5: “Catūhi apāyehi ca vippamutto avinipātadhammo”ti vacanato apāyagamanīyañca dassanena pahātabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:439_8: na so tassa apāyagamanīyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesāti etena saṅgahoti sakkā vattuṃ niyogato bhāvanāya pahātabbabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:440_0: “Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttakammapaccayabhāvo nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo.
tika-abh04t0:440_1: So ca yadi uddhaccasahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍheyya,
tika-abh04t0:440_3: Tathā ca sati uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ siyā dassanena pahātabbānaṃyeva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:440_4: Na cetaṃ dassenena pahātabbanti sabbaṃ pubbe viya āvattati.
tika-abh04t0:441_0: Sahajātameva vibhattanti yathā dassanena pahātabbavibhaṅge “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo neva dassanena
tika-abh04t0:441_1: na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo”ti sahajātaṃ nānākkhaṇikanti uddisitvā “sahajātā
tika-abh04t0:441_2: dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh04t0:441_3: nānākkhaṇikā dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vibhattaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:441_4: evaṃ avibhajitvā “bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:441_5: na vuttaṃ “nānākkhaṇikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh04t0:441_6: Tena na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvoti viññāyati.
tika-abh04t0:441_7: Paccanīyepi yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgāhakapaccayānaṃ vasena paccayuddhāre kariyamāne.
tika-abh04t0:441_9: Tattha hi “dassanena pahātabbo dhammo neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh04t0:442_1: Na ca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthīti “paṭisandhianākaḍḍhanato tattha anāgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:442_2: Etthāti “ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ sesāni ekādaseva paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhantī”ti ettha.
tika-abh04t0:442_3: Pavattivipākassāti pavattiyaṃ vipāko pavattiekadesatāya pavattibhūto vā vipāko etassāti pavattivipākaṃ, kammaṃ, tassa.
tika-abh04t0:442_5: Imasmiṃ pana atthe nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayo etassāti nānā…pe… yo,
tika-abh04t0:442_8: Na sakkā nivāretuṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā vipākassa anuppajjanato.
tika-abh04t0:443_2: Itaro vipākadānābhāvepi siddho vipākadhammabhāvo tādisānaṃ aññesampi labbhamānattāti āha “abhiññācittādīna”nti. Ādi-
tika-abh04t0:443_3: saddena attano kālamatikkantaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t0:443_4: Vuttaṃ siyāti idaṃ sahāyapaccayalābhato puthujjanasantānavuttino uddhaccasahagatassa vipākuppādanaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:443_5: tadabhāvā sekkhasantatiyaṃ tassa vipākānuppādanañca yuttaṃ siyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:443_7: Tathā ca vakkhati “puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādassa
tika-abh04t0:443_8: ca saṃyojanattayatadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ anupacchinnatāya aparikkhīṇasahāyānaṃ vipākuppādanaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti
tika-abh04t0:443_11: asati vipākānuppādanavacanaṃ virujjhatīti ca pavattivipākadāyikaṃ vā uddhaccasahagatassa manasi katvā “vuttaṃ siyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:443_12: “Pavattivipākañhi sandhāya ‘tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa’nti paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge vutta”nti eke vaṇṇayanti.
tika-abh04t0:443_14: sāpi viññāṇapaccayabhāve apanetabbāti idampi paṭisandhiviññāṇameva sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-abh04t0:447_6: Tathā ca sati tassa vipākadānameva na siyāti tato aññathā atthaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:447_8: Katokāsatā ca anādimhi saṃsāre anekesaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ atthitāya parassa paṭibāhanena hotīti “aññassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:447_9: Vaḍḍhitatā ca sakammassa baladānasamatthatāvasena attano kāraṇehi abhisaṅkhatatā.
tika-abh04t0:448_0: Cakkhusannissitañca taṃ rūpavijānanañcāti etena samānādhikaraṇataṃ samāsassa dassento tattha ca “cakkhusannissita”ntiādipadadvayassa
tika-abh04t0:448_3: Rūpaṃyevārammaṇanti pana atthe dibbacakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ taṃsadisānaṃ tadupacāraṃ katvā yathā “sā eva tittirī tāni eva osadhānī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:448_4: Jhānapaccayattābhāve na jhānaṅgatā natthīti pañcaviññāṇesu upekkhādīnaṃ upacaritajhānaṅgataṃ sādheti.
tika-abh04t0:448_5: Na hi jhānaṅgānaṃ jhānapaccayataṃ vatvā tesaṃ jhānapaccayabhāvo paṭikkhittoti.
tika-abh04t0:448_6: Yadi evaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu upekkhādayo jhānarāsiṭṭhāne na vattabbā siyunti āha “jhānapaccayattābhāve”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:449_2: bhavaṅge apaṇḍare taṃmūlikā kuto akusalassa paṇḍaratāti “akusalassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:449_7: Yato dhammānaṃ sabhāvakiccavisesaññunā bhagavatā viññāṇaṃyeva tathā niddiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh04t0:450_2: Pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ visayassa yogyadese avaṭṭhānanti “pasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā āpāthaṃ gantvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:450_3: Mahābhūtesu paṭihaññatīti ettha na sayaṃ kiñci paṭihaññati,
tika-abh04t0:450_5: Visayavisayībhūtaṃ pana abhimukhabhāvappattiyā viññāṇuppattiyā hetutāya visiṭṭhabhāvappattaṃ paṭihatapaṭighātakabhāvena voharīyati,
tika-abh04t0:450_8: Mahābhūtārammaṇena pana kāyappasādanissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu ghaṭṭiyamānesu pasādopi ghaṭṭito eva nāma hotīti vatvā vīmaṃsitabba”nti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:450_9: Yathādhippetena ekadesasāmaññena upamāvacanato nissitanissayaghaṭṭanānaṃ satipi pubbāparabhāve upamatte
tika-abh04t0:451_1: Dassanādippavattibhāvatoti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ adassanāditāya sā etesaṃ eva viseso.
tika-abh04t0:451_3: Aññanissayaviññāṇassa anantarapaccayattābhāvenāti iminā kiriyāmanodhātutopi visesassa vuttattā “manodvāraniggamanamukhabhāvābhāvato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:451_5: Tividhenapi hi manodhātuviññāṇadhātūhi manoviññāṇadhātuyā viseso dassitoti.
tika-abh04t0:451_8: chaviññāṇakāyāti kathaṃ manodhātuyā tattha saṅgaho hotīti?
tika-abh04t0:451_10: Atthi hi esa pariyāyo “mananamattaṃ viññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇa”nti yathā “mananamattā dhātu manodhātū”ti.
tika-abh04t0:451_11: Apica vatthukiccehi manoviññāṇasabhāgattā tassa uparamuppādabhāvato antādibhāvato ca manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitā manodhātu,
tika-abh04t0:451_13: idha pana nippariyāyakatattā manaso sambhūya visiṭṭhamanokiccayuttaṃ manoviññāṇanti tadabhāvato “manoviññāṇantipi
tika-abh04t0:451_14: na vuccatī”ti imamevatthaṃ sādhetuṃ “na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ manato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:451_16: Dassanādīnaṃ panātiādinā aññaviññāṇavidhuraṃ manodhātuyā ca sabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:452_0: Yadi janakasadisatā nāma mahāvipākesu vitakkādīnaṃ sammāsaṅkappāditā,
tika-abh04t0:452_3: tihetukato pana nibbattaduhetukānaṃ kathanti āha “tattha hī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:452_5: Tato eva hītiādinā vuttasotapatitaṃ evānantarena vacanena samatthayati.
tika-abh04t0:452_6: Yadi vijjamānānampi manodhātuādīsu vitakkādīnaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu viya agaṇanūpagabhāvo,
tika-abh04t0:452_7: evaṃ sante paṭṭhāne kathaṃ tesaṃ jhānapaccayatāvacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:452_9: “vipākābyākatāni kiriyābyākatāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:452_10: Paccanīyepi “abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati na jhānapaccayā,
tika-abh04t0:452_11: pañcaviññāṇasahitaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādinā pañcaviññāṇāni eva uddhaṭāni,
tika-abh04t0:453_1: Samānavatthukaṃ anantarapaccayaṃ labhitvāti dassanādito manodhātuyā ca balavabhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:453_3: Yadi samānanissayatāya manodhātuto balavatarattaṃ vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā somanassasahagatāya,
tika-abh04t0:453_4: voṭṭhabbanaṃ kathaṃ majjhattavedananti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā tassa balavabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchitvā santatipariṇāmanabyāpāravisesā
tika-abh04t0:453_6: Vipāko viya anubhavanameva na hotīti sati samatthatāya vipākānaṃ ekantena ārammaṇarasānubhavanatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:456_1: Vipākadhammānaṃ kammadvāraṃ vuttaṃ dvārakathāyaṃ “tebhūmakakusalākusalo ekūnatiṃsavidho mano”ti.
tika-abh04t0:456_2: Payogenāti attanā parehi vā katena ussāhanapayogena.
tika-abh04t0:456_3: Kusalākusalāni viya yesaṃ taṃ tadārammaṇaṃ anubandhabhūtaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:456_4: Paṭhamapañcamacittānaṃ aññamaññabalavadubbalabhāvavicārena dutiyachaṭṭhādīnampi so vicārito hotīti “etesu balavaṃ dubbalañca vicāretu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:456_5: Yathā sāliādīnaṃ thaddhamudubhūmivasena tiṇādīnaṃ anīharaṇanīharaṇavasena utuādiavasesapaccayānaṃ vipattisampattivasena ca phalavisesayogo,
tika-abh04t0:456_6: evaṃ kammassa sugatiduggativasena avisuddhavisuddhapayogavasena upapattiyā vipattisampattivasena ca visiṭṭhaphalatāya pariṇamanaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:456_7: evameva gimhavassakālādīsu bījānaṃ phalavisesayogo viya taṃtaṃkālavisesena kammassa phalavisesayogo hotīti āha “kālavasena pariṇamatī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:456_8: Sukkasoṇitapaccayānanti kammavisesaparibhāvitasantānuppannatāya sukkasoṇitānaṃ āyuvisesahetubhāvamāha sukkasoṇitavasenapi vaṇṇādivisesadassanato,
tika-abh04t0:458_4: Pavattivipākaṃ pana tihetukato duhetukampi icchati eva.
tika-abh04t0:458_5: Tathā hi vakkhati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yaṃ purimāya hetukittanaladdhiyā na yujjatī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:459_3: Duggatiṃ nābhijānāmī”ti ca evamādivacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā “kiṃ nu kho ekenapi kammena anekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti,
tika-abh04t0:459_4: “disvā kumāraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādivacanassa atthaṃ asallakkhetvā “kinnu kho nānākammehi ekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti saṃsayapakkhandā,
tika-abh04t0:459_6: anekasmā ca anekā paṭisandhi hotī”ti vinicchitattā kammapaṭisandhivavatthānato sāketapañhe vipākuddhārakathāya
tika-abh04t0:459_9: Paṭisandhijanakakammavasena paṭisandhivipāko eva alobhalobhādiguṇadosātirekabhāvahetūti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:459_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hotī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:459_16: eko tikoti lobhādidassanavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā.
tika-abh04t0:459_17: Tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādidassanavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti.
tika-abh04t0:460_2: alobhadosāmohā balavanto”ti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā.
tika-abh04t0:460_5: lobhādosāmohā balavanto”ti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā gahitāyevāti
tika-abh04t0:460_6: akusalakusalapakkhe tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
tika-abh04t0:460_7: Ye pana ubhayesaṃ vomissatāvaseneva lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
tika-abh04t0:460_9: Na hi ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ lobho balavā alobho cāti yujjati.
tika-abh04t0:460_12: Tesu lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhato alobhena anabhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo,
tika-abh04t0:460_14: Alobhādīnaṃ pana lobhādiabhibhavanato sabbesañca samānajātiyaṃ samabhibhūya pavattivaseneva sahajātadhammato balavabhāvo.
tika-abh04t0:460_19: So ca tesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:460_21: sattamapaṭhamehi vā vārehi tihetukakammato paṭisandhipavattivasena tihetukavipāko,
tika-abh04t0:460_22: itarehi tihetukaduhetukakammato yathāsambhavaṃ paṭisandhipavattivasena duhetukāhetukavipākā dassitāti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:461_8: Kammasarikkhakoti idha sātisayo sarikkhabhāvo adhippetoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:461_10: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnīti ettha pañcaviññāṇāni viya apubbanissayapavattinī vijānanavisesarahitā ca manodhātu
tika-abh04t0:461_11: iṭṭhādibhāgaggahaṇe na samatthāti “pākaṭāyevā”ti na vuttā, ādi-
tika-abh04t0:462_3: Sopi moghavāro labbheyyāti yadi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā,
tika-abh04t0:462_4: yathā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā na maggapaccayā”ti anulomapaccanīye,
tika-abh04t0:462_6: na maggapaccayā āsevanapaccayā”ti ca vuttaṃ hasituppādacittavasena,
tika-abh04t0:462_7: evaṃ voṭṭhabbanavasena “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena pāṭho siyā,
tika-abh04t0:462_8: tathā ca sati vāradvayavasena gaṇanāyaṃ “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve.
tika-abh04t0:462_9: Na maggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh04t0:463_2: tathā sati attanāpi kusalākusalānaṃ siyā. Na hi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:463_3: avutto atthi “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā”tiādinā anavasesato vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:463_5: avutto “abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh04t0:463_12: Samānavedanānaṃ eva āsevanapaccayabhāvassa dassanato “asamānavedanānaṃ vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:463_19: Gaṇanāya kāraṇabhūtāya gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya sati gaṇanāya vā abbhantare.
tika-abh04t0:463_20: Dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitabboti āsevanapaccayattābhāvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh04t0:463_21: Na hi vinā āsevanaṃ javanappavatti atthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:464_1: taṃ chinnamūlakarukkhapupphaṃ viyā”ti vakkhamānattā anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ pavattamānassa voṭṭhabbanassa kiriyabhāvo na siyā,
tika-abh04t0:464_2: vutto ca “yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā upekkhāsahagatā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:464_3: tasmā “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāti javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvā,
tika-abh04t0:464_5: “āsevanaṃ labhitvāti ca āsevanaṃ viya āsevana”nti vuccamāne na koci virodho,
tika-abh04t0:464_6: vipphārikassa pana sato dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyevettha āsevanasadisatā.
tika-abh04t0:464_8: Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā dubbalattā na nippariyāyato āsevanapaccayabhāvena
tika-abh04t0:464_9: pavatteyyāti na imassa pāṭhe āsevanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:464_10: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pariyāyato vuttaṃ yathā “phalacittesu maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti.
tika-abh04t0:465_2: Tasmāti yasmā voṭṭhabbanaṃ āvajjanāyeva atthato upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātubhāvato, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:465_3: Taṃ āvajjanā viya sati uppattiyaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyajavanānaṃ ekantato anantarapaccayabhāveneva vatteyya,
tika-abh04t0:465_5: Catunnanti muñchāmaraṇāsannavelādīsu mandībhūtavegatāya cattāripi javanāni uppajjeyyunti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:465_9: “āvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti pana vuttattā cittappavattivasena paṭhamamoghavārato etassa na koci viseso.
tika-abh04t0:465_12: Paṭisandhicitteyeva pavattiyaṃ “bhavaṅga”nti vuccamāne na tassa hetuvasena bhedoti “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
tika-abh04t0:465_13: ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, vuttañca,
tika-abh04t0:465_14: tasmā sahetukaṃ bhavaṅganti tadārammaṇaṃ vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh04t0:466_2: Appaṭisiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbanti “duhetukasomanassasahagataasaṅkhārikajavanāvasāne evā”ti imassa atthassa anadhippetattā.
tika-abh04t0:466_3: Yathā ca ahetukaduhetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ tihetukajavanāvasāne ahetukaduhetukatadārammaṇaṃ appaṭisiddhaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:466_5: duhetukapaṭisandhikassa ca duhetukānantaraṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ appaṭisiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:466_6: “Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukampi duhetukampi ahetukampi vipākaṃ detī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:466_7: Paripuṇṇavipākassāti imināpi tihetukajavanato yathāvuttatadārammaṇassa appaṭisiddhaṃyeva sādheti.
tika-abh04t0:466_8: Na hi paccayantarasāmaggiyā asati tadārammaṇaṃ sabbaṃ avipaccantaṃ kammaṃ paripuṇṇavipākaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:466_14: Tasmāti yasmā paripuṇṇavipākassa paṭisandhijanakakammassa vasena vipākavibhāvanāya mukhanidassanamattamevetaṃ, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:467_0: Evañca katvāti nānākammato tadārammaṇuppattiyaṃ ito aññathāpi sambhavatoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:467_3: Tadārammaṇakiccaṃ tāva na hoti javanārammaṇassa anālambaṇato,
tika-abh04t0:468_8: Tathā ca uppajjatīti “anantarapaccayo hotī”ti padassa atthaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh04t0:469_0: Upanissayato tasseva cakkhuviññāṇādivipākassa dassanatthaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ dassanādiatthato dassanādiphalato,
tika-abh04t0:469_3: Vatthantararahitatte dassetabbe vatthantare viya ārammaṇantarepi na vattatīti “vatthārammaṇantararahita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:470_1: evaṃ sati imasmiṃ vāre ahetukavipākānaṃ asambhavo eva siyā tesaṃ akammasarikkhakattāti imamatthaṃ manasi katvā āha “ahetukānaṃ panā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:470_3: Te hi āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu abhinipātanamatteneva vattanti. Ādi-
tika-abh04t0:470_5: Kusalesu kusalākusalakiriyesupi vā vijjamānā sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārikatā aññamaññaṃ asarikkhattā pahānāvaṭṭhānato
tika-abh04t0:470_6: ca viruddhā viyāti vipākesu sā tadanukūlā siyā,
tika-abh04t0:470_7: sā pana mūlābhāvena na suppatiṭṭhitānaṃ savisayābhinipatanamattādivuttīnaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “na sasaṅkhārikaviruddho”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:470_8: Ubhayenapi tesaṃ nibbattiṃ anujānāti yathā “kaṭattārūpāna”nti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:470_10: Vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
tika-abh04t0:470_14: kusalākusale niruddhe”tiādinā vipākattike viya siyā kusalattikepi pāḷīti katvā “kusalattike cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:470_15: Tattha hi “kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti uddisitvā “sekkhā vā puthujjanā
tika-abh04t0:470_16: vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
tika-abh04t0:470_23: akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:470_24: Avijjamānattā eva avacananti adhippāyena tattha yuttiṃ dasseti “vipphārikañhī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:471_0: Ettha keci “chaḷaṅgupekkhāvatopi kiriyamayacittatāya kiriyajavanassa vipphārikakiriyabhāvo na sakkā nisedhetunti
tika-abh04t0:471_2: Kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇābhāvassa pāḷiyaṃ avacanampi akāraṇaṃ labbhamānassapi katthaci kenaci adhippāyena avacanato.
tika-abh04t0:471_3: Tathā hi dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto,
tika-abh04t0:471_5: Satipi kiriyamayatte sabbattha tādibhāvappattānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ javanacittaṃ na itaresaṃ viya vipphārikaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:471_6: santasabhāvatāya pana sannisinnarasaṃ siyāti tassa paṇṇapuṭaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:471_7: Dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese adhipatino viya paṭṭhāne kiriyajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇassa labbhamānassa avacane na kiñci kāraṇaṃ dissati.
tika-abh04t0:471_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ tattha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “heṭṭhā dassitanayattā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:471_9: Na cettha dassitanayattāti sakkā vattuṃ vipākadhammadhammehi kusalākusalehi ataṃsabhāvānaṃ nayadassanassa ayujjamānakattā.
tika-abh04t0:471_10: Apica tattha vīmaṃsāya kesuci sabbesañca adhipatīnaṃ abhāvato ekarasaṃ desanaṃ dassetuṃ “uddhaṭo”ti ca sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:471_11: idha pana na tādisaṃ avacane kāraṇaṃ labbhatīti “avacane kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:472_0: Adhippāyenāti akusalānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇaṃ natthīti tassa therassa matimattanti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:472_1: “Kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato pana akusalānantaraṃ sahetukatadārammaṇampi
tika-abh04t0:473_0: Na ettha kāraṇaṃ dissatīti etena tihetukajavanānantaraṃ tividhampi tadārammaṇaṃ yuttanti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:473_1: Yena adhippāyenāti paṭhamatherena tāva ekena kammunā anekatadārammaṇaṃ nibbattamānaṃ kammavisesābhāvā
tika-abh04t0:473_2: taṃtaṃjavanasaṅkhātapaccayavisesena visiṭṭhaṃ hotīti iminā adhippāyena javanavasena tadārammaṇassa sasaṅkhārādividhānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:473_5: Aññathā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo siyāti evamadhippāyena dutiyatthero kammavaseneva tadārammaṇavisesaṃ āha.
tika-abh04t0:473_7: tatiyatthero “tihetukakammato duhetukapaṭisandhimpi nānujānātī”ti iminā nayena tesu vādesu adhippāyāvirodhavasena
tika-abh04t0:473_9: Mahāpakaraṇe āgatapāḷiyāti “sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imassa
tika-abh04t0:473_10: vibhaṅge “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh04t0:473_11: sahetukā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā paṭṭhāne sahetukadukādīsu āgatapāḷiyāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:476_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vijjamānānaṃ chandādīnanti etena vipākajjhāne dukkhāpaṭipadādibhāvassa avijjamānataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:476_2: Na hi kusalajjhānaṃ viya vipākajjhānaṃ parikammavasena nibbattatīti.
tika-abh04t0:476_3: Na cettha paṭipadābhedo viya kusalānurūpo vipākassa ārammaṇabhedopi na paramatthiko siyāti sakkā vattuṃ
tika-abh04t0:476_4: ekantena sārammaṇattā arūpadhammānaṃ vipākassa ca kammanimittārammaṇatāya aññatrāpi vijjamānattā.
tika-abh04t0:476_5: Nānākkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyanti “yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ jhānaṃ yadadhipatikaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:476_6: tato aññasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ jhānaṃ ekantena tadadhipatikaṃ na hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:476_7: Catutthajjhānassevāti ca paṭipadā viya adhipatayo na ekantikāti imamevatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:479_9: “Maggānantaraphalacittasmiṃ yevā”ti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā “suññatādināmalābhe satī”ti sāsaṅkaṃ āha.
tika-abh04t0:479_10: Animittanāmañca labhati maggāgamanato phalassa nāmalābhe visesābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:480_2: Cattāro maggā”ti vacanato aniyyānikapadaniddese ca “catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko”ti vuttattā na nippariyāyena phalaṃ niyyānasabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:480_3: niyyānasabhāvassa pana vipāko kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānavasena pavattamāno pariyāyato tathā vuccatīti āha “niyyānikasabhāvassā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:480_4: Pañcaṅgiko cāti etena maggavibhaṅge sabbavāresupi phalassa maggapariyāyo āgatoti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:480_5: Tattha hi ariyamaggakkhaṇe vijjamānāsupi viratīsu tadavasiṭṭhānaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ atirekakiccatādassanatthaṃ
tika-abh04t0:480_8: evaṃ maggabojjhaṅgavibhaṅgesu phalesu ca bojjhaṅgā uddhaṭāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:483_5: evaṃ ghānadvārādīsupi mahākiriyacittehi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye idamatthikatāya paricchinnāya idaṃ cittaṃ vattatīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:483_6: Pañcadvārānugataṃ hutvā labbhamānanti pañcadvāre pavattamahākiriyacittānaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakabhāvena imassa cittassa pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:483_7: pañcadvāre eva vā idameva pavattanti sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:483_9: bhūta”nti vuttattā pañcadvāre paṭhamaṃ iminā cittena somanassito hutvā pacchā mahākiriyacittehi taṃ taṃ
tika-abh04t0:483_10: atthaṃ vicinotīti ayamattho vutto viya dissati.
tika-abh04t0:483_11: Pubbeyeva pana manodvārikacittena padhānasāruppaṭṭhānādiṃ paricchindantassa pañcadvāre tādisasseva tādisesu rūpādīsu idaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:483_12: Ayampi attho pañcadvāre eva pavattaṃ loluppataṇhāpahānādipaccavekkhaṇāhetu yathāvuttakāraṇabhūtaṃ jātanti evaṃ yojetvā sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh04t0:483_13: Evañca sati imassa cittassa paccayabhūtā purimā pavattīti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh04t0:484_0: Ettha ca pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:484_3: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:484_5: Iminā hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti.
tika-abh04t0:484_6: Evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho,
tika-abh04t0:484_7: evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:484_9: aññathā āvajjanacittassapi bhagavato pavatti na yujjeyya.
tika-abh04t0:484_11: na ca viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatte taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āvajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti.
tika-abh04t0:485_0: Tato evāti mūlābhāvena na suppatiṭṭhitattā eva.
tika-abh04t0:485_1: “Ahetukānaṃ jhānaṅgāni balāni cā”ti sampiṇḍanattho jhānaṅgāni cāti ca- saddo.
tika-abh04t0:485_2: Yadi aparipuṇṇattā balabhāvassa imasmiṃ ahetukadvaye balāni anuddiṭṭhāni asaṅgahitāni ca,
tika-abh04t0:485_4: Sammā niyyānikasabhāvānaṃ kusalānaṃ paṭibhāgabhūto vipākopi phalaṃ viya taṃsabhāvo siyāti sahetukavipākacittāni
tika-abh04t0:486_2: imassānantaraṃ uppajjamānānī”ti vuttaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kāmāvacarattā.
tika-abh04t0:487_4: Attāti vā diṭṭhigatikehi gahetabbākārena bhavati pavattatīti attabhāvo.
tika-abh04t0:492_1: Cittuppādena tāva rūpassa samayavavatthānaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ abyāpitāya anekantikatāya cāti imamatthaṃ dassento “acittasamuṭṭhānasabbhāvato”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:492_2: Tattha acittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ cittassa tīsu khaṇesu uppajjatīti imasmiṃ tāva vāde cittuppattisamayena rūpūpapattisamayassa vavatthānaṃ mā hotu,
tika-abh04t0:492_3: cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva sabbampi rūpaṃ uppajjatīti imasmiṃ pana vāde kathanti?
tika-abh04t0:492_4: Etthāpi acittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ cittena sahuppādepi anindriyabaddharūpaṃ viya acittapaṭi bandhuppādatāya
tika-abh04t0:492_6: Tena cittuppādena rūpassa samayavavatthānaṃ na byāpīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:492_8: Niyate hi samuṭṭhāpakacitte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa siyā vavatthānanti.
tika-abh04t0:493_4: “Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī”tiādinā cittasahabhāvinaṃ eva cittena samayavavatthānaṃ katanti vuttaṃ “acittasahabhubhāvato”ti.
tika-abh04t0:493_7: so eva tassa samayavavatthāpakabhāvena vuttoti āha “sahajāta…pe…
tika-abh04t0:494_1: na sakkā vattuṃ mahābhūtehi samayavavatthāne kariyamāne tehi ayāvabhāvitatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:494_2: Ekasmiṃ kāletiādināpi mahābhūtehi samayaniyamane vavatthānābhāvameva vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t0:494_4: “avibhattaṃ abyākataṃ atthīti dassetu”nti ca imesaṃ padānaṃ “vibhattaṃ avibhattañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanto āhā”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:494_5: Samayavavatthānaṃ katvā niddisiyamānassa nippadesatāya asambhavato ekadesaṃ niddisitvā sāmaññena nigamanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:494_6: akatvā pana samayavavatthānaṃ sarūpato niddisanena tathāti imamatthaṃ āha “samayavavatthānenā”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:494_7: Avibhatteti vipākakiriyābyākataṃ viya na pubbe vibhatte.
tika-abh04t0:495_6: Dukādīsu niddesavāre ca hadayavatthuno anāgatattā taṃ aggahetvā paṭhamavikappo vutto,
tika-abh04t0:495_7: ekake pana vatthupi gahitanti “hadayavatthuñcā”ti dutiyavikappe vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:495_8: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ dukādīsu niddesavāre ca hadayavatthu na gahitanti?
tika-abh04t0:495_14: tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi tadanukūlaārammaṇadukādayo na sambhavanti.
tika-abh04t0:495_16: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”ntiādinā sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukadesanā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:495_17: samānagatikā ca tā desetuṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayo.
tika-abh04t0:495_19: Teneva hi nikkhepakaṇḍe cittuppādavibhāgena avuccamānattā avitakkāvicārapadavissajjane vicāroti vattuṃ
tika-abh04t0:495_20: na sakkāti avitakkavicāramattapadavissajjane labbhamānopi vitakko na uddhaṭo,
tika-abh04t0:495_22: Evaṃ itaravatthūhi asamānagatikattā desanābhedato ca dukādīsu uddese na gahitaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:495_23: Uddiṭṭhasseva hi niddisanato niddesepi na gahitaṃ hadayavatthūti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:496_2: Nibbānassa asatipi paramatthato bhede parikappitabhedopi bhedoyeva vohāravisayeti katvā sopādisesādibhedo vutto.
tika-abh04t0:497_3: cakkasaṇṭhānatā pana vaṭṭasaṇṭhāne cakkavāḷe vuccamāno parimaṇḍala-
tika-abh04t0:497_6: Ettha ca sineruyugandharādīnaṃ samuddato upariadhobhāgānaṃ vasena ubbedho vutto,
tika-abh04t0:498_0: Koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷasseva āṇākhettabhāvo dasasahassacakkavāḷassa jātikhettabhāvo viya dhammatāvaseneva veditabbo.
tika-abh04t0:498_1: Vikappasamānasamuccayavibhāvanesu viya avadhāraṇe aniyame ca vā-
tika-abh04t0:499_2: Satipi lakkhaṇādibhede ekasmiṃ eva kāle ekasmiṃ santāne anekasatasahassakalāpavuttito mahantāni bahūni
tika-abh04t0:499_3: bhūtāni paramatthato vijjamānānīti vā mahābhūtāni yathā “mahājano”ti.
tika-abh04t0:499_4: Evanti “upādāya pavatta”nti atthe sati paṭiccasamuppannatā vuttā hoti paccayasambhūtatādīpanato.
tika-abh04t0:499_7: “Bhavati hi nissayarūpānaṃ sāmibhāvo”ti ādhārādheyyasambandhavacanicchāya abhāve ādhārabhūtopi attho
tika-abh04t0:499_8: saṃsāmisambandhavacanicchāya sāmibhāvena vuccati yathā “rukkhassa sākhā”ti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:501_4: viññātunti ettha pañcavīsāya tāva vatthudukesu paṭhamadukapañcakādayo cuddasahipi pakiṇṇakadukehi avasiṭṭhehi
tika-abh04t0:501_5: vatthudukehi pañcavīsāya ārammaṇadukehi pañcahi bāhirāyatanadukehi rūpadhātudukādīhi pañcahi dhātudukehi
tika-abh04t0:501_6: pacchimakehi tīhi indriyadukehi dvādasahipi sukhumarūpadukehi paṭhamādivajjehi avasiṭṭhehi āyatanadhātuindriyadukehi
tika-abh04t0:501_9: pakiṇṇakadukehi sabbehipi vatthudukehi rūpāyatanarūpadhātudukavajjehi āyatanadhātudukehi sabbehipi indriyadukasukhumarūpadukehi
tika-abh04t0:501_11: Dutiyadukapañcakādīsu yathākkamaṃ saddāyatanasaddadhātudukādayo yojanaṃ na gacchanti,
tika-abh04t0:501_18: Itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyadukā sukhumarūpadukā ca sabbehipi dukehi yojanaṃ gacchantīti evaṃ tāva tikayojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:501_19: Nanu cāyampi yojanā bhagavatā na desitāti na kātabbāti?
tika-abh04t0:501_22: Tathā hi vuttaṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ “hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā cāti idampi sambhavatī”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:504_1: Cittato eva samuṭṭhātīti cittasamuṭṭhānanti imameva atthaṃ gahetvā “viññattidukādīhi samānagatiko cittasamuṭṭhānaduko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:504_2: Vinivattite hi sāmaññe yaṃ rūpaṃ janakapaccayesu cittato samuṭṭhāti,
tika-abh04t0:505_1: Catukkā labbhantīti yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:505_6: atthi cakkhusamphassassa nārammaṇanti evamādayo sabbārammaṇabāhirāyatanādilabbhamānadukehi yojanāyaṃ catukkā labbhantīti sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:505_12: Etthāpi avasesehi tesaṃ aññesañca yojanāya catukkā na labbhantīti sambandho.
tika-abh04t0:510_1: Pathavīādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ ruppanasabhāvo viya na hetuādibhāvopi sādhāraṇoti na hetūsu vibhajitabboti vuttaṃ “avijjamānavibhāgassā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:510_3: Evañca katvā nibbānassapi vibhāgarahitattā “asaṅkhatā dhātū”ti ettakameva niddesavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:511_0: Yadipi hinoti etena patiṭṭhāti kusalādiko dhammoti alobhādayo kevalaṃ hetupadavacanīyā,
tika-abh04t0:511_4: Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato kusalādidhammānaṃ mūlatthena upakārakadhammā “tayo kusalahetū”tiādinā paṭṭhāne
tika-abh04t0:511_5: ca teyeva “hetupaccayo”ti vuttāti āha “mūlahetu paccayahetūti vā ayamattho”ti.
tika-abh04t0:511_8: paṭicca etasmā eti pavattatīti paccayoti evaṃ hetupaccaya-
tika-abh04t0:511_11: Bhūtattayanissitāni ca mahābhūtāni catumahābhūtanissitaṃ upādārūpanti sabbampi rūpaṃ sabbadā sabbattha
tika-abh04t0:511_12: sabbākāraṃ catumahābhūtahetukaṃ mahābhūtāni ca anāmaṭṭhabhedāni sāmaññato gahitānīti vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhassa hetū”ti.
tika-abh04t0:513_3: yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya,
tika-abh04t0:513_7: yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya.
tika-abh04t0:513_13: yaṃ kāyasucaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyyā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:514_2: evamādivacanato kammaṃ vipākassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhataṃ niyametīti āha “iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākaniyāmakattā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:514_4: Na hi tehi vinā koci vipāko nibbattatīti.
tika-abh04t0:514_7: Vipākassa ārammaṇena vinā abhāvato ārammaṇampi tassa padhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:515_1: Taṃ assa atthīti ettha “assā”ti vuccamāno pathavīādiatthoyeva ruppatītipi vuccatīti āha “ruppanalakkhaṇayuttasseva rūpīrūpabhāvato”ti.
tika-abh04t0:515_2: Etaṃ sabhāvanti etaṃ uppannabhāve sati chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvaṃ rūpe niyameti rūpasseva taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh04t0:515_3: Na rūpaṃ etasminti kālabhedavasena ataṃsabhāvassapi rūpassa atthitāya na rūpaṃ tattha niyantabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:515_4: Atthi hītiādinā tattha rūpasseva niyantabbatābhāvaṃyeva vivarati.
tika-abh04t0:515_6: Ettha etameva rūpe yathāvuttasabhāvaṃ niyametabbaṃ niddese eva-
tika-abh04t0:515_8: Yathāvutto niyamoti uppannabhāve sati chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyabhāvo niyantabbatāya “niyamo”ti vutto,
tika-abh04t0:515_9: so rūpe atthi eva rūpasseva taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh04t0:515_10: Visiṭṭhakālassa vuttappakāraṃ avadhāraṇaṃyeva vā yathāvutto niyamo,
tika-abh04t0:515_12: na arūpe viya na sambhavatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh04t0:515_15: Taṃ sabbanti anāmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ tatoyeva arūpehi samānaviññeyyasabhāvaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:516_3: Nāpi uppannameva chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyasabhāvaṃ ekantalakkhaṇaniyamābhāvāpattitoti evaṃ aviparīte atthe
tika-abh04t0:516_4: vibhāvitepi codako adhippāyaṃ ajānanto “nanu eva”ntiādinā sabbassa sabbārammaṇatāpattiṃ codeti.
tika-abh04t0:516_5: Itaro “rūpaṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh04t0:516_6: Ettha ekībhāvena gahetvāti idaṃ “sampiṇḍetvā”ti etassa atthavacanaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:516_9: kiñcāpi pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayantare appavattanato na sabbassa sabbārammaṇatā,
tika-abh04t0:516_10: sabbassapi pana rūpassa chaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvato yathāsakaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyatāya chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyatāva atthi,
tika-abh04t0:516_11: taṃ ekato saṅgahaṇavasena gahetvā “uppannaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ chahi viññāṇehi viññeyya”nti vuttaṃ yathā “abhiññāppattaṃ
tika-abh04t0:516_13: Yathā hi dibbacakkhudibbasotādiabhiññāppattassa pañcamajjhānassa visuṃ asabbārammaṇattepi ekantalakkhaṇavasena
tika-abh04t0:516_14: ekībhāvena gahetvā ārammaṇavasena paṭhamajjhānādito visesaṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññāppattaṃ pañcamajjhānaṃ chaḷārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh04t0:516_16: evaṃ arūpato rūpassa visayavasena visesaṃ dassetuṃ “uppa …pe…
tika-abh04t0:516_21: saddoti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paccuppannarūpameva cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:516_25: na ca tassa aṭṭhānayojanena kāci iṭṭhasiddhi,
tika-abh04t0:516_26: atha kho aniṭṭhasiddhiyeva sabbarūpassa ekantalakkhaṇaniyamādassanato, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:517_0: Ñāṇassa vā uttarassa purimañāṇaṃ vatthukāraṇanti ñāṇavatthu.
tika-abh04t0:517_5: Ārammaṇe cetaso avikkhepappavattiyā upaṭṭhānussāhanāni viya tesaṃ avikkhepopi atisayena upakārakoti “aññamaññopakāravasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:517_6: Teneva vijjamānesupi aññesu sahajātadhammesu etesaṃyeva samādhikkhandhasaṅgaho dassito.
tika-abh04t0:517_7: Yaṃ pana saccavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ visuddhimaggādīsu ca “vāyāmasatiyo kiriyato saṅgahitā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:517_8: taṃ asamādhisabhāvataṃ tesaṃ samādhissa upakārakattañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:517_9: Teneva ca tattha “samādhiyevettha sajātito samādhikkhandhena saṅgahito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:517_10: Idha pana sajātisaṅgahoti samādhitadupakārakadhammānaṃ uppattidesavasena saṅgaho vuttoti.
tika-abh04t0:517_12: appanā ca ārammaṇe daḷhanipāto tadavagāhoyevāti “paṭivedhasadisaṃ kicca”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:517_13: Atha vā ārammaṇapaṭivedhassa tadāhananapariyāhananamanuguṇatāya samānanti paññāvitakkānaṃ kiccasarikkhatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:521_1: Samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu samantacakkhūti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:521_3: saddo “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti tīsupi padesu paccekaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-abh04t0:521_11: Aggamaggena pana saha vipassanā paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh04t0:522_0: Yathāvutte maṃsapiṇḍe sasambhāre cakkhuvohāro santānavasena pavattamāne catusamuṭṭhānikarūpadhamme upādāya pavattoti “catu…pe…
tika-abh04t0:522_2: Saṇṭhānanti vaṇṇāyatanamevāti tena tena ākārena sanniviṭṭhesu mahābhūtesu taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānavasena vaṇṇāyatanassa viññāyamānattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:522_4: Tathā hi andhakāre phusitvāpi saṇṭhānaṃ viññāyatīti.
tika-abh04t0:522_5: Tathā ca vakkhati “dīghādīni phusitvāpi sakkā jānitu”nti,
tika-abh04t0:522_7: Tesaṃ sambhavasaṇṭhānānaṃ āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanehi anatthantarabhāvepi tehi visuṃ vacanaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ sambhavabhūtānaṃ saṇṭhānabhūtānañca.
tika-abh04t0:522_8: Etena āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānaṃ vasena vattamānaavatthāviseso sambhavo saṇṭhānañcāti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-abh04t0:522_10: Tassa rāgavasena ṭhānā vacanaṃ hotīti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:522_14: Tathā hi khīṇāsavānaṃ brahmānañca sambhavo natthīti.
tika-abh04t0:522_15: Āpodhātuvisesattā sambhavo āpodhātusambandhī āpodhātutannissayanissitopi hotīti tassa catudhātunissitatāya avirodho vutto.
tika-abh04t0:523_0: Utucittāhārehi upatthambhiyamānanti ettha “kalāpantaragatā utuāhārā adhippetā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:523_1: Anekakalāpagatabhāvaṃ cakkhussa dasseti yato upaddutapaṭale nirākaraṇepi cakkhu vijjatīti.
tika-abh04t0:524_4: Cakkhuṃ saṅgaṇhātīti cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvānupagamanepi taṃsabhāvānativattanato tassā samaññāya tattha niruḷhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:524_5: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭho cakkhussa indaṭṭhoyevāti “yathā hi issaro”tiādinā issaropamā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:524_6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakicce pariṇāyantaṃ cakkhu taṃsahajāte cakkhusamphassādayopi tattha pariṇāyatīti vuccatīti “te dhamme…pe…
tika-abh04t0:524_9: Atha vā cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvena upakārakaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakicce pariṇāyantaṃ
tika-abh04t0:524_10: cakkhu tattha cakkhusamphassādayopi tadanuvattake pariṇāyatīti atthāyaṃ pariyāyoti dassento āha “te dhamme…pe…
tika-abh04t0:524_12: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ cakkhatīti imassa “pariṇāyati pakāsetī”ti ca atthā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:524_13: Saṇṭhānampi rūpāyatanamevāti “samavisamāni rūpāni cakkhatīti cakkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:525_2: uppatti vuttāti cakkhuviññāṇe uppanne sampaṭicchanādīni balavārammaṇe javanaṃ ekantena uppajjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:525_3: Tathā ceva hi antarā cakkhuviññāṇe vā sampaṭicchane vā santīraṇe vā ṭhatvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti nicchitaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:525_5: Taṃsadisānanti garuṃ katvā assādanādippavattivisesarahitatāya dassanasadisānaṃ manodhātusantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:525_6: Pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ assādanādito aññathā garuṃ katvā pavatti natthi rūpadhammavisayattāti “assādanābhinandanabhūtānī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:525_7: Manodvārikajavanapiṭṭhivaṭṭakānampi hi pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ assādanābhinandanabhāvena rūpaṃ garuṃ katvā pavatti natthīti na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh04t0:525_9: Tathā hi paṭṭhāne “abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh04t0:525_10: Ārammaṇādhipati cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatī”tiādinā rūpadhammopi ārammaṇādhipati vibhatto.
tika-abh04t0:525_11: “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa abyākato dhammo kusalassā”ti ettha pana phalanibbānāneva ārammaṇādhipatibhāvena vibhattānīti.
tika-abh04t0:525_20: Yasmā pana rūpaṃ taṃdvārikajavanānaṃ paccayavisesopi hoti,
tika-abh04t0:525_21: tasmā tassa visesassa dīpanatthaṃ “ārabbhā”ti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti āha “ārammaṇapaccayato aññapaccayabhāvassapi dīpaka”nti.
tika-abh04t0:526_1: Sotaviññāṇappavattiyaṃ savanakiriyāvohāroti sotassa savanakiriyāya kattubhāvo sotaviññāṇassa paccayabhāvenāti
tika-abh04t0:526_4: tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhāti evaṃ siddhena jivhā-
tika-abh04t0:526_5: saddena pakāsiyamānā rasāvhāyanasaṅkhātā sāyanakiriyā labbhatīti katvā vuttaṃ “jivhāsaddena viññāyamānā kiriyāsāyana”nti.
tika-abh04t0:526_8: Pasādakāyassa kāyikānaṃ dukkhasukhānaṃ nissayabhāvato itaresaṃ upanissayabhāvato “dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhānaṃ āyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:526_14: Tasmāti yasmā yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādinnakapavattaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-abh04t0:526_15: sabbattha kāyāyatanaṃ kappāsapaṭale sneho viyāti vuttaṃ, tasmā.
tika-abh04t0:526_16: Paṇḍarasabhāvā pasādā āpāthagataṃ visayaṃ viññāṇuppattihetubhāvena pakāsentā viya hontīti tesaṃ visayāvabhāsanakiccatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:527_2: tasmā rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā hotu,
tika-abh04t0:527_3: evaṃsabhāvo so rūpadhammoti dassetuṃ “rūpābhighātāraho”ti vuttaṃ yathā “vipākārahasabhāvā kusalākusalā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:527_4: Visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhabhāvo abhighāto viyāti abhighāto,
tika-abh04t0:527_8: Tenevāha “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:527_9: “cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti ca ādi.
tika-abh04t0:527_10: Ettha ca taṃtaṃbhavapatthanāvasena cakkhādīsu avigatarāgassa attabhāvanipphādakasādhāraṇakammavasena purimaṃ cakkhulakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:527_11: sudūrasukhumādibhedassapi rūpassa gahaṇasamatthameva cakkhu hotūti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena dutiyaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:527_13: Atha vā satipi pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa pasādabyāpārassa dassanavasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:527_14: pasādakāraṇassa satipi kammabhāvasāmaññe attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:528_2: Tassa tassa bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti
tika-abh04t0:528_6: Ettha ca daṭṭhukāmatādīnaṃ taṃtaṃattabhāvanibbattakakammāyūhanakkhaṇato sati purimanibbattiyaṃ vattabbaṃ natthi.
tika-abh04t0:528_7: Asatipi tassa maggena asamugghātitabhāveneva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:528_8: Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa kāraṇabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
tika-abh04t0:528_9: uppannaatthitāpariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto
tika-abh04t0:528_10: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpeti”,
tika-abh04t0:528_11: “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandoti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
tika-abh04t0:529_4: Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa bhinnattā.
tika-abh04t0:529_5: Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ tesaṃ kathaṃ visesoti?
tika-abh04t0:529_7: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
tika-abh04t0:529_9: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogena anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-abh04t0:529_11: Na cettha samatthatābhāvato aññaṃ veditabbaṃ kāraṇavisesenāhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatābhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:529_12: Tathā hi sati ekassapi kammassa anekindriyahetutāvisesayogaṃ ekampi kammantiādinā yuttito āgamatopi parato sayameva vakkhati.
tika-abh04t0:529_13: Tathā ca ekasseva kusalacittassa soḷasādivipākacittanibbattihetubhāvo vuccati.
tika-abh04t0:529_17: Yato kammavipāko cakkhādīni kammavipāko ca sabbākārato buddhānaṃyeva kammavipākañāṇaphalayuttānaṃ visayo,
tika-abh04t0:529_19: Teneva ca bhagavatā “kammavipāko acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
tika-abh04t0:529_20: yo cinteyya ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti ādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:529_21: Āviñchanaṃ puggalassa viññāṇassa vā taṃninnabhāvappattiyā hetubhāvo.
tika-abh04t0:530_0: Sabbesanti padassa pakaraṇato pārisesato vā labbhamānaṃ atthavisesaṃ ajānanto yathārutavaseneva atthaṃ gahetvā “ko ettha viseso”tiādinā codeti.
tika-abh04t0:530_1: Itaro tejādīnaṃ paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva ekakādivasena
tika-abh04t0:530_2: labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti viññāyamānattā pakaraṇato pārisesato vā catunnampi bhūtānaṃ
tika-abh04t0:530_3: samabhāvena kāyo hotīti ayamattho siddhoti sabba-
tika-abh04t0:530_5: Imamatthaṃ dīpetīti ca yathāvuttena ñāyena “sabbesa”nti vacanato ayamattho labbhati,
tika-abh04t0:530_11: Catudhātusamudāyanissayassa hi pasādassa tadekadhātuadhikatā avayavādhikatā hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:531_1: Ālokādisahakārīkāraṇasahitānaṃyeva cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādiavabhāsanasamatthatā vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇupanissayabhāvo
tika-abh04t0:531_4: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāyaṃ dassento “taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:531_9: pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “yathāyogaṃ taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehī”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh04t0:531_11: Upakaritabbatoti sahakārīkāraṇabhūtehi yathāvuttabhūtaguṇehi cakkhādīnaṃ sakiccakaraṇe upakaritabbato.
tika-abh04t0:531_12: Sabhāvena suyyamānassāti kenaci anuccāriyamānasseva labbhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:531_14: Atha vā vāyumhi saddo sabhāvena suyyatīti āpe raso madhuroti ca tassa laddhiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:531_15: Dutiyavādissapi niggaho hoti tassapi tejādiguṇā rūpādayoti evaṃladdhikattā.
tika-abh04t0:532_2: Kappāsato visadisāyāti kappāsapathavito visesayuttāya tato adhikasāmatthiyayuttāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:532_4: Yasmā sā vijjamānānipi avisesabhūtāni atthīti gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhavitvā ṭhitā,
tika-abh04t0:532_5: tasmā tassāyeva gandho adhikataro bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:532_6: Ayañca sabbo uttaro “tassa tassa bhūtassa adhikatāyā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā tathāgatānaṃ vādaṃ
tika-abh04t0:532_8: “Attano pana matena kaṇādakapilādayo kevalaṃ pathavādidrabyamevātiādi laddhi.
tika-abh04t0:532_9: Kaṇādasāsanāya adhimuttānaṃ sāsane anavagāḷhānaṃ kesañci ayaṃ vādo”ti ca vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:532_10: Etassubhayassāti āsavagandhato kappāsagandho adhiko sītudakavaṇṇato uṇhodakavaṇṇo ca adhikoti etassa ubhayassa.
tika-abh04t0:532_11: Tejādiadhikesu ca sambhāresu rūpādīnaṃ visesassa adassanato na rūpādayo tejādīnaṃ visesaguṇoti siddhanti āha “tadabhā…pe… ttitā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:532_12: Tena na rūpaṃ tejassa visesaguṇo ekantato tejādike sambhāre visesena adassanato,
tika-abh04t0:532_14: na so tadadhike sambhāre ekantato visesena dissati yathā pathavīadhike sambhāre āpodhātūti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:532_16: Ko pana vādo nānākalāpeti sabhāvato nānattābhāvepi mūlakāraṇanānattavasena atthi koci viseso asaṅghāteti dasseti,
tika-abh04t0:533_10: Tena anekasabhāvena kāraṇena āhitavisesaṃ ekampi kammaṃ anekasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nipphādetuṃ samatthaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh04t0:533_13: kāraṇavisesābhāve phalavisesassa asambhavato yaṃ visesayuttaṃ kammaṃ cakkhussa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:533_14: tassa tato aññavisesābhāve tadaññindriyuppādakatāpi na siyāti sotindriyādīnaṃ tato anuppatti eva siyā.
tika-abh04t0:534_0: Anekāhi mahaggatacetanāhi ekāya vā parittacetanāsahitāya paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpānaṃ nibbattīti na sakkā viññātunti “sabbesaṃ…pe…
tika-abh04t0:534_2: Idāni tameva asakkuṇeyyataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “nānācetanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:534_5: paccayo”ti ettha yadi nānākammavasena indriyānaṃ uppatti adhippetā,
tika-abh04t0:534_6: evaṃ sati mahaggatakammena ca kāmāvacarakammena ca taṃtaṃpaṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpaṃ uppannaṃ siyā,
tika-abh04t0:534_8: Nāpi taṃtaṃbhavaniyatarūpindriyehi vikalindriyatā gatisampattiyā opapātikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe yuttā.
tika-abh04t0:534_12: Evaṃ ekena mahaggatakammunā cakkhundriyasotindriyahadayavatthūnaṃ uppattiñāpakena iminā vacanena parittakammunāpi
tika-abh04t0:534_13: ekena yathārahaṃ anekesaṃ indriyānaṃ uppatti siddhāvāti vuttaṃ “siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:535_2: Atisukhumabhāvato maṃsacakkhuagocarena rūpāyatanena samannāgatasaṅghātavuttitāya ca “vāyu viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:535_3: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo na siyā dhātuparamparāya ghaṭṭentassa utusamuṭṭhānattā.
tika-abh04t0:535_6: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:536_0: Nanu cirena suyyantīti dūre ṭhitānaṃ lahukaṃ savanaṃ natthi,
tika-abh04t0:536_1: tesampi vā lahukaṃ savanena dūrāsannabhāvānaṃ viseso na siyāti adhippāyo. Na, dū…pe…
tika-abh04t0:536_2: toti na dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena sotaviññāṇena suyyanti,
tika-abh04t0:536_3: sace savanūpacāre so saddo dūre āsanne ca ṭhitānaṃ yathābhūte āpāthagate sadde manoviññāṇasaṅkhātato
tika-abh04t0:536_4: gahaṇavisesato cirena suto sīghaṃ sutoti abhimānoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:536_14: Uppattivasena āgatānīti etena rūpadhammāpi yattha uppajjanti,
tika-abh04t0:537_0: Cakkhumato puggalassa ajjhāsayavasenāti citravicitrarūpāyatane yebhuyyena sattānaṃ cakkhudvārikajavanassa anukaḍḍhanavasena pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:537_1: Kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva pavattanatoti etena adhiṭṭhānato bahiddhā indriyaṃ pavattīti vādaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh04t0:537_2: Adhiṭṭhānadese eva hi indriyaṃ vattati tattha kiccādippayogadassanato.
tika-abh04t0:537_3: Satipi panassa bahiddhā vuttiyaṃ na visayaggahaṇe samatthatā,
tika-abh04t0:537_5: Ārammaṇaggahaṇahetuto cāti kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva ṭhatvā ārammaṇakaraṇassa viññāṇassa vā hetubhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:538_0: Tabbohārenāti gandhagandhaggahaṇassa sahacaritāya gandhopi tathā vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:538_3: Tathā pathavīti sahakārīpaccayantarabhūtā ajjhattikabāhirā pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe paccayoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:538_8: Vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānanti idaṃ cakkhudasakaṃ idaṃ kāyadasakaṃ idaṃ bhāvadasakanti evaṃ kalāpatopi vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:539_1: Dīghādīnaṃ phusitvā jānitabbatoti idaṃ dīghādīnaṃ na kāyaviññāṇagocarattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:539_2: dīghādivohārarūpādīnaṃ pana phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattena manoviññāṇenapi jānitabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:539_4: Ekasmiṃ itarassa abhāvāti chāyātapānaṃ ālokandhakārānañca asahaṭṭhāyitaṃ āha.
tika-abh04t0:539_7: Andhakārassa nissayo hutvā pavattamānāni bhūtāni kamena tathārūpassa vaṇṇāyatanassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantī”ti keci.
tika-abh04t0:539_8: Saha andhakārena tannissayabhūtānaṃ nirodhasamanantaraṃ taṃsantatiyaṃ tādise paccayasannipāte ālokanissayabhūtānaṃ uppattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:539_9: Na hi nissayamahābhūtehi vinā ālokappavatti atthi,
tika-abh04t0:539_10: nāpi andhakārasaṅkhātaṃ vaṇṇāyatanameva nirujjhati taṃnissayehi payujjamānakaekakalāpabhūtopādārūpānaṃ saheva nirujjhanato.
tika-abh04t0:539_11: Padīpasikhāmaṇiraṃsiyo viya pathavīpākārarukkhādīni muñcitvāpi andhakāro pavattatīti vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:539_12: Mandaṃ pana pākārādiādhārarahitaṃ na suṭṭhu paññāyati,
tika-abh04t0:539_13: bahalaṃ ādhāraṃ nissāya pavattatīti yuttanti ca vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:541_4: Itthindriyaṃ paṭicca samuṭṭhahantīti aññamaññapaccayānipi itthiliṅgādīni yebhuyyena itthindriyasahite
tika-abh04t0:541_5: eva santāne sabbhāvā itarattha ca abhāvā indriyahetukāni vuttāni.
tika-abh04t0:541_11: atha kasmā tassa indriyādipaccayabhāvo tesaṃ na vuttoti?
tika-abh04t0:541_13: atha kho tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitāmattena taṃ kāraṇanti vuccatīti dassetuṃ āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:542_1: Liṅgaṃ parivattamānaṃ purimaliṅgādhārajātianurūpameva hutvā parivattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “paṭisandhiyaṃ viya pavattepī”ti. Yassa…pe…
tika-abh04t0:543_1: Dvārabhāvena kucchitānaṃ āsavadhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya pasādavisese viya viññattivisesepi kāyavohārappavatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh04t0:543_4: Pathavīdhātuyā ākāro vacīviññattīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-abh04t0:544_2: gahitāti yathādhippetatthābhibyañjikāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpanādhippāyappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:544_3: Tadā hi sā tehi pariggahitā nāma hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:544_4: Ekassapi akkharassa anekehi javanehi nibbattetabbattā tathā nibbattiyamānatāya asamatthasabhāvattā na viññātavisesā na bhinnā evāti āha “sava…pe…
tika-abh04t0:545_0: Atha vā “ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti,
tika-abh04t0:545_2: no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī”ti rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ kāmāvacaracuticittassapi kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanavacanena
tika-abh04t0:546_0: “Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti āmantā”ti,
tika-abh04t0:547_0: “Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti āmantā”ti ca,
tika-abh04t0:548_0: “Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhati cittasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhissatī”ti –
tika-abh04t0:549_0: Ādivacanato ca pacchimacittassa purato soḷasamena cittena tato orimena vā saddhiṃ assāsapassāsā na uppajjantīti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:549_2: “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro na nirujjhatī”ti na vadeyya,
tika-abh04t0:549_4: tasmā heṭṭhimakoṭiyā cutito purimena sattarasamena uppannā assāsapassāsā cutiyā heṭṭhā dutiyena cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhanti.
tika-abh04t0:549_5: Tena “yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissatī”ti cuticittassānantarapaccayabhūtassapi
tika-abh04t0:550_0: Atha vā yassa cittassāti yena cittena sabbapacchimo kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati.
tika-abh04t0:550_4: yato pacchā kāyasaṅkhāruppādanena anantaritaṃ hutvā pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissatīti attho. Kasmā?
tika-abh04t0:550_5: “Itaresaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissati kāyasaṅkhāro ca nirujjhissatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-abh04t0:550_7: Evaṃ sabbesampi cuticittassa rūpajanakatābhāve āgamaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttiṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:551_1: Anekesaṃ kalāpānaṃ ekato hutvā ekaghanapiṇḍabhāvena pavattanato kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh04t0:551_4: Taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatāti tesaṃ tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ vibhattabhāvo kalāpantarabhūtehi vibhattasabhāvatā asaṃkiṇṇatāti attho.
tika-abh04t0:551_5: Yasmā pana yathāvuttā vivittatā rūpānaṃ osānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh04t0:551_10: Tatoyeva ca so bhūtantarehi viya tehi asamphuṭṭhoti vuccatīti.
tika-abh04t0:552_1: Taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehīti ettha kathaṃ cammasuvaṇṇesu mudutākammaññatā labbhanti,
tika-abh04t0:552_2: nanu lahutādivikārā ekantato indriyabaddharūpe eva pavattanato anindriyabaddhe na labbhantīti?
tika-abh04t0:552_5: Tathā hi tūlapicuādīsu garubhāvādihetūnaṃ bhūtānaṃ adhikabhāvābhāvato lahuādivohāro.
tika-abh04t0:552_6: Niddisitabbadhammanissayarūpe eva vā sandhāya “taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:552_7: Sabbe sabbesaṃ paccayā lahutādīnaṃ aññamaññāvijahanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:553_2: Yo āyatanānaṃ ādicayattā ācayo punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:553_3: sova rūpassa uparicayattā upacayoti adhippetaṃ atthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “pāḷiyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upa-
tika-abh04t0:554_2: Phalameva vā pakatīti āyusaṃhānādinā phalasabhāvena jarāniddesoti attho.
tika-abh04t0:555_2: Visabhūte saṅghāte ojā mandā hotīti savisattābhāvato sukhumatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:555_3: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāroti rasaharaṇīdhamanijālānusārena sarīrāvayave anuppaviṭṭhassa āhārarasassa abbhantarāhārapaccayo sneho,
tika-abh04t0:558_1: “Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādivacanato ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ avasesamahābhūte nissayati,
tika-abh04t0:558_2: tehi upādārūpena ca nissīyatīti āha “nissayati ca nissīyati cā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:559_1: Mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññāvijahanato ekasmimpi kalāpe anekaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ atthīti phoṭṭhabbasabhāvesuyeva
tika-abh04t0:559_2: anekesupi ārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu ābhogādivasena ekaṃyeva viññāṇuppattihetu hotīti ayaṃ vicāro dassito.
tika-abh04t0:559_4: Tattha rasārammaṇaṃ tāva indriyanissayaṃ allīyitvā viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato satipi anekesaṃ rasānaṃ āpāthagamane
tika-abh04t0:559_5: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekappakāraṃyeva yathāvuttanayena jivhāviññāṇuppattihetu hoti,
tika-abh04t0:559_7: Rūpasaddārammaṇāni pana indriyanissayaṃ asampatvāva viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato yogyadese avaṭṭhitāni yattakāni
tika-abh04t0:559_9: tattakāni ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti na vattabbāni.
tika-abh04t0:559_10: Tathā hi saddo nigghosādiko anekakalāpagato tathā vaṇṇopi sivikubbahananiyāmena ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:559_11: Etthāpi ca ābhujitavasena ārammaṇādhimattatāvasena anekakalāpasannipātepi katthaci viññāṇuppatti hotiyeva.
tika-abh04t0:559_13: Kathaṃ pana cittassāti cittasāmaññato ekattanayavasena pucchati.
tika-abh04t0:560_1: Tādisāyāti yā pacurajanassa atthītipi na gahitā.
tika-abh04t0:560_5: Tadanurūpapaccayehīti attano ābandhanānuguṇehi ābandhiyamānehi sandhāraṇādikiccehi purimehi ca pathavīādīhi.
tika-abh04t0:560_7: aphusitvā ābandhatīti iminā phusitabbaphusanakabhāvo āpodhātuyaṃ natthīti phoṭṭhabbavasena ubhayadhammataṃ āha.
tika-abh04t0:560_9: Atha vā aññamaññatā ca nissayatā ca aññamaññanissayatā.
tika-abh04t0:560_11: pathavīādīnaṃ kakkhaḷādisabhāvo eva phoṭṭhabbabhāvoti tabbirahena kathaṃ tesaṃ āpodhātuyā nissayādibhāvoti āha “avinibbhogavuttīsū”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:560_13: Atha vā pubbe aṭṭhakathādhippāye ṭhatvā phoṭṭhabbāphoṭṭhabbadhātūnaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ aññamaññanissayataṃ vatvā
tika-abh04t0:560_14: idāni attano adhippāye ṭhatvā avisesena taṃ dassento āha “avinibbhogavuttīsū”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:560_15: Taṃyeva avisiṭṭhaṃ aññamaññanissayataṃ daḷhaṃ katvā dassento “nāpi sahajātesū”tiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:560_16: Tattha aphusanaṃ tāva ekakalāpagatattā na vicāretabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:560_19: Visuṃ siddhānaṃyeva hi visayamahābhūtānaṃ kāyappasādanissayabhūtesu phusanaṃ dissati.
tika-abh04t0:561_1: Na uṇhā hutvāti etassa uṇhasabhāvā hutvāti ayamatthoti katvā “tejosabhāvataṃyeva paṭikkhipatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:561_2: Uṇhapaṭipakkhattā sītassa uṇhatāya paṭikkhepe sītatāsaṅkā siyāti āha “na sītattaṃ anujānātī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:561_3: Tejosabhāgataṃyeva vā sītatāyapi dassetuṃ “na sītattaṃ anujānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:561_5: Mande hi uṇhabhāve sītabuddhīti tejo eva hi sītaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:561_8: Tathā hi ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti,
tika-abh04t0:561_11: uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ sītabhāvopi ekasmiṃ kalāpe upalabbheyyāti āha “sītuṇhānañcā”tiādi.
tika-abh04t0:561_15: Āpodhātuyā hi vāyodhātuyā sītabhāve uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe sītabhāvo labbheyya,
tika-abh04t0:561_17: Na cettha āpodhātuadhike vāyodhātuadhike vā kalāpe sītabhāvoti sakkā viññātuṃ tādisepi katthaci kalāpe alabbhamānattā sītabhāvassāti.
tika-abh04t0:562_3: Purimānampīti “yaṃ vā panaññampī”ti etasmā vacanato purimānaṃ anupādinnānaṃ saddāyatanakāyaviññattiādīnaṃ
tika-abh04t0:562_9: Anekantesu na gahitāti ekantato akammajesu saddāyatanādīsu acittajesu ca cakkhāyatanādīsu gahetvā catusamuṭṭhānikattā
tika-abh04t0:563_0: 666. Anipphannattāti aññaṃ anapekkhitvā sabhāvato asiddhattaṃ. Tassāti viññattidvayassa.
tika-abh04t0:567_1: “Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato yadi viññātato aññaṃ diṭṭhādi na hotīti “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ diṭṭha”ntiādinā pucchā na katā,
tika-abh04t0:567_2: evaṃ sante catukkabhāvo kathanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “dassanādiggahaṇavisesato”ti.
tika-abh04t0:567_3: Dassanaṃ savanaṃ minitvā jānanaṃ vijānanañcāti etasmā dassanādiggahaṇavisesato.
tika-abh04t0:569_0: 969. Tadidaṃ nayakaraṇaṃ chabbidhādīsu tīsu saṅgahesu yojitaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:571_1: Ekantato nīvaraṇattā middhassa “natthi nīvaraṇā”ti vacanena gahaṇanti dassetuṃ “middhassapi nīvaraṇassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:571_2: Na ca rūpaṃ pahātabbaṃ nippariyāyappahānassa idha adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t0:571_6: Tattha yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:571_7: tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvato itaraṃ middhaṃ viyāti parikappitamiddhassapi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ
tika-abh04t0:571_8: nivattetunti tesaṃ vacanassa nīvaraṇappahānavacanena virodhaṃ dassento “na ca rūpakāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh04t0:571_9: Atha vā khīṇāsavānaṃ soppanasabhāvato soppassa ca middhahetukattā atthi middharūpanti vādaṃ sandhāya uttaramāha “na ca rūpakāyagelañña”ntiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:571_10: Tattha middhameva soppahetūti nāyaṃ avadhāraṇā icchitā,
tika-abh04t0:571_11: soppahetu eva middhanti pana icchitāti middhato aññopi soppahetu atthi,
tika-abh04t0:572_5: tato eva na jātiādidhammavantānīti āha “na sayaṃ sabhāvavantānī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:572_7: evaṃ jātipīti jātiyā rūpabhāvamattatāya upasaṃharaṇattho tathā- saddo.
tika-abh04t0:573_4: Evamapīti yadipi jiraṇabhijjanabhāvā jiraṇādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ janakapaccayakiccānubhāvakkhaṇe abhāvato
tika-abh04t0:573_7: “Jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti vacanato tassa pariyāyataṃ vivarati “tesaṃ uppāde satī”tiādinā.
tika-abh04t0:574_2: “Mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato bhūtanissitesu kevalo upādāyavohāroti upādāye nissitāpi aparena upādāya-
tika-abh04t0:574_3: saddena visesetvā vattabbāti adhippāyena “upādāyupādāyabhāvo āpajjatī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:574_4: Kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇe viya vohāro hoti “corehi gāmo daḍḍho”ti yathāti dassento “bhūta…pe…
tika-abh04t0:574_6: Idāni paramparā vinā nippariyāyato uppādādīnaṃ bhūtapaṭibaddhabhāvaṃ saha nidassanena dassetuṃ “api cā”tiādimavoca.
tika-abh04t0:574_7: Vikāraparicchedāpi upādāyarūpavikārādibhāve bhūtapaṭibaddhabhāvāvinivattito ekasmiṃ kalāpe ekekāva vikārādayoti
tika-abh04t0:574_8: jīvitindriyaṃ viya kalāpānupālakaṃ kalāpavikārādibhāvato ca “upādāyarūpāni”icceva vuccantīti āha “evaṃ vikā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:575_0: Asaṅkhatabhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ parinipphannatā vuttāti idaṃ aparinipphannasabhāvavato anupalabbhamānatāya
tika-abh04t0:575_1: sasavisāṇaṃ viya kenaci na saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ nāma siyāti imissā āsaṅkāya nivattanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:575_2: Atha vā rūpavikārādibhāvato rūpabhāvo viya rūpe sati santi,
tika-abh04t0:575_3: asati na santīti siddhāya paṭiccasamuppannatāya sādhitā parinipphannatā tesaṃ saṅkhatabhāvaṃ sādhentī
tika-abh04t0:575_4: asaṅkhatabhāvaṃ nivāraṇatthaṃ jāyatīti vuttaṃ “asaṅkhatabhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ parinipphannatā vuttā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:580_2: veneyyajjhāsayavasena vā chandādayo “yevāpanā”ti vuttāti yevāpanakānaṃ paduddhārena niddesānarahatāya
tika-abh04t0:580_3: kāraṇaṃ vuttanti hadayavatthussa tathā niddesānarahatāya kāraṇaṃ vadanto “sukhumupā…pe…
tika-abh04t0:580_5: Sukhumabhāvepi indriyādisabhāvāni upādāyarūpāni ādhipaccādivasena pākaṭāni honti,
tika-abh04t0:580_6: na ataṃsabhāvaṃ sukhumupādāyarūpanti hadayavatthussa paduddhārena kusalattikapadabhājane niddesānarahatā vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:580_7: Sukhumabhāvatoyeva hi taṃ mahāpakaraṇepi “yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattantī”ti nissitadhammamukhena dassitanti.
tika-abh04t0:580_8: Veneyyajjhāsayavasena vā hadayavatthu paduddhārena na dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:580_9: Yena pana adhippāyena rūpakaṇḍe hadayavatthu duvidhena rūpasaṅgahādīsu na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:580_11: Nikkhipitvāti padassa pakkhipitvāti atthoti adhippāyena “vitthāradesanaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:580_12: Mūlādivasena hi desitā kusalādidhammā taṃtaṃcittuppādādivasenapi desitā eva nāma honti taṃsabhāvānativattanatoti.
tika-abh04t0:581_1: Etāni hetupadādīni hinoti phalaṃ etasmā pavattatīti hetu,
tika-abh04t0:581_8: tīṇi kusalamūlānīti ayañca mūlato nikkhepoti? Na,
tika-abh04t0:581_10: so eva mūlaṭṭhoti suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanaṭṭhena mūlasabhāvānaṃ alobhādidhammānaṃ kusaladhammesu kiccavisesassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t0:581_12: Atha vā atthavasenāti “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”ti vuttānaṃ tesaṃ mūlānaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaatthavasena,
tika-abh04t0:581_14: Yasmā pana so mūlaṭṭhoyeva ca hoti,
tika-abh04t0:581_19: saddena vā vedanākkhandhādayopi saṅgahitāti dassetuṃ “te kusalamūlā taṃsampayuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:582_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā”ti pucchitvā phassādibhedato cattāro khandhe dassetvā “ime dhammā kusalā”ti vuttatā
tika-abh04t0:582_1: khandhā ca kusalanti vuttaṃ “khandhehi sabhāvato kusale pariyādiyatī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:582_5: Mūlehi kusalānaṃ anavajjatāya hetuṃ dassetīti idaṃ na mūlānaṃ kusalassa anavajjabhāvasādhakattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:582_7: Yadi hi mūlehi kato kusalānaṃ anavajjabhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh04t0:582_9: mūlānaṃ vā tesaṃ paccayabhāvo na siyā,
tika-abh04t0:582_13: Kiñca bhiyyo kusalānaṃ viya akusalābyākatānampi tabbhāvo mūlapaṭibaddho bhaveyya,
tika-abh04t0:582_14: tathā sati ahetukānaṃ akusalābyākatānaṃ tabbhāvo na siyā,
tika-abh04t0:582_18: Sahetukā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā suppatiṭṭhitā thirā honti,
tika-abh04t0:582_20: Taṃsampayogakataṃ anavajjasabhāvanti idampi na anavajjasabhāvassa taṃsampayogena nipphāditattā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:582_22: Alobhādisampayogato hi kusalādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ anavajjabhāvo suppatiṭṭhito jāyati,
tika-abh04t0:582_24: Yadi evaṃ na tesaṃ khandhānaṃ kusalādibhāvo dassito siyā? Na,
tika-abh04t0:582_27: so ca idha avisesato vuttoti āha “kammehi sukhavipākataṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-abh04t0:583_1: “Kasmā vutta”nti anuyuñjitvā codako “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-abh04t0:583_8: Na hi vicikicchuddhaccasahagato moho vicikicchuddhaccādidhammehi vinā hotīti.
tika-abh04t0:584_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh04t0:584_7: taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya gahetabbo jhānagocaraviseso kasiṇapaññatti.
tika-abh04t0:584_8: Paramatthe amuñcitvā vohariyamānāti iminā vihāramañcādipaññattīnaṃ sattapaññattisadisataṃ dasseti,
tika-abh04t0:584_10: Hutvā abhāvapaṭipīḷanaavasavattanākārabhāvato saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ākārabhāvato saṅkhatadhammānaṃ ākāravisesabhūtāni
tika-abh04t0:584_12: tāni pana nissayānapekkhaṃ na labbhantīti paññattisabhāvāneva tajjāpaññattibhāvatoti na vuttāni,
tika-abh04t0:584_13: sattaghaṭādito visesadassanatthaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visuṃ vuttānīti.
tika-abh04t0:585_4: Tassa bhūmibhedena niddhāraṇatthaṃ taṃnissayabhūtā sampayuttadhammā “kāmāvacare”ti vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:585_5: Tassa vā ekadesabhūtassa samudāyabhāvato ādhāraṇabhāvena apekkhitvā taṃsamānabhūmi “kāmāvacare”ti vuttā.
tika-abh04t0:585_6: Tattha “sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare”ti dvepi bhummavacanāni bhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānīti
tika-abh04t0:585_7: ubhayesampi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena atthayogaṃ dassetuṃ “sukhabhūmīti kāmāvacarādayopi yujjantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:585_9: evaṃ sabbepi parittasukhena sampayuttā dhammā tassa nissayabhāvato bhūmi kāmāvacarāti.
tika-abh04t0:585_12: Tena vuttaṃ “cittaṃ uppannanti ettha cittameva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva cittaṃ gahita”nti.
tika-abh04t0:586_1: Ko pana vādo khandhārammaṇassāti pubbāparabhāvena vattamāne arahato khandhe ekattanayavasena santānato
tika-abh04t0:586_2: “amhākaṃ mātulatthero”tiādinā ālambitvā pavattamānaṃ upādānaṃ tassa upādānakkhandheyeva gaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t0:586_3: Satipi taṃsantatipariyāpanne lokuttarakkhandhe tattha pavattituṃ asamatthabhāvato kā pana kathā khandhe ārabbha pavattamāne.
tika-abh04t0:586_5: natthi nibbānanti evamādivasena pavattā micchādiṭṭhiādayo na maggādivisayā taṃtaṃpaññattivisayāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh04t0:587_0: 998. Evaṃ saṃ…pe… lesikāti anupādāniyehi asaṃkilesikānaṃ bhedābhāvamāha.
tika-abh04t0:588_1: Avijjamāno ca so niccādivipariyāsākāro cāti avi…pe…
tika-abh04t0:588_3: Diṭṭhiyā niccādiavijjamānākārena gayhamānattepi na tadākāro viya paramatthato avijjamāno,
tika-abh04t0:588_4: atha kho vijjamāno kāyo sakkāyoti avijjamānaniccādivipariyāsākārato visesananti lokuttarā na idaṃ visesanaṃ arahanti “santo vijjamāno kāyo sakkāyo”ti.
tika-abh04t0:588_5: Vatthu avisesitaṃ hotīti idaṃ “satī kāye”ti ettha kāya-
tika-abh04t0:588_6: saddo samūhatthatāya anāmasitavisesaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ vadatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:588_7: Pasādakāyo viya kucchitānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya kāyoti vuccatīti evaṃ pana atthe sati diṭṭhiyā vatthu visesitameva hotīti lokuttarāpi apanītā.
tika-abh04t0:588_8: Na hi lokuttarā khandhā uppattiṭṭhānatāya “kāyo”ti vuccantīti.
tika-abh04t0:588_16: taṃsamādānavato vesabhojanakiccacaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti vata”nti ca sīlabbatānaṃ visesaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh04t0:589_1: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti uppādoti na jananamattaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:589_2: atha kho anirodhopīti “avighātaṃ janasaddo vadatī”ti āha.
tika-abh04t0:589_7: Puthū janā etesanti puthujjanāti puthusatthumānino sattā.
tika-abh04t0:589_10: Khandhāyatanādīnaṃ savanādhīnattā paññācakkhupaṭilābhassa tesaṃ savanābhāvadīpakaṃ “assutavā”ti idaṃ padaṃ andhataṃ vadati.
tika-abh04t0:590_0: Kataṃ jānantīti attanā parehi ca kataṃ kusalākusalaṃ tehi nipphāditaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ yāthāvato jānanti.
tika-abh04t0:590_2: attano ca parehi kataṃ upakāraṃ yathāvuttākārena pākaṭaṃ karonti.
tika-abh04t0:590_6: Pariññādivisesena vā passiyamānāti atthe sati aniccādayoti ādi-
tika-abh04t0:590_7: saddena niccampi nibbānaṃ gahitanti catusaccavasenapi yojetabbaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:591_2: Yathābhūtāvabodhena hi tassa tāni anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditatāya santāne appavesārahāni “saṃvutāni pihitānī”ti ca vuccanti.
tika-abh04t0:591_4: Aviparītadhammā etāya nijjhāyaṃ khamantīti paññā khantīti.
tika-abh04t0:591_5: Aduṭṭhasseva titikkhābhāvato tathāpavattā khandhāti adosappadhānā khandhā vuttāti “adoso eva vā”ti tatiyo vikappo vutto.
tika-abh04t0:591_11: paṭipadāñāṇadassanañāṇadassanāni viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ appavattikaraṇabhāvena vattati,
tika-abh04t0:592_1: dassanādibyāpāraṃ vā attānañca dassanādikiccaṃ cakkhādīnanti evañhi yathātakkitaṃ attānaṃ rūpanti gaṇhāti.
tika-abh04t0:592_3: Na hi diṭṭhigatiko rūpāyatanameva attāti gaṇhātīti.
tika-abh04t0:592_4: Imissāpavattiyāti sāmaññena rūpaṃ attāti sabbasaṅgāhakabhūtāya pavattiyā. Rūpe…pe…
tika-abh04t0:592_5: mānanti cakkhādīsu taṃsabhāvo attāti pavattamānaṃ attaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:592_8: Nanu ca rukkhapupphamaṇiyo paramatthato na vijjanti?
tika-abh04t0:592_10: tadupādānaṃ pana vijjatīti taṃ samuditādippakāraṃ idha rukkhādipariyāyena vuttanti rukkhādinidassanepi
tika-abh04t0:592_11: na doso chāyārukkhādīnaṃ viya rūpassa attano ca saṃsāmibhāvādimattassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh04t0:594_2: parato “avaseso lobho”tiādivacanato pārisesato sāmatthiyato vā labbhamānatāya satipi āgatatte sarūpena
tika-abh04t0:594_3: pabhedena vā diṭṭhiādayo viya anāgatattā lobhādayo “anāgatā”ti vuttāti āha “idha …pe…
tika-abh04t0:594_5: Atthato viññāyati lobhādīhi sahajātā hutvā diṭṭhiyā eva pāḷiyaṃ vuttakilesabhāvato.
tika-abh04t0:594_6: Itipi attho yujjati saṃyojanakilesānampi paṭiniddesārahattā sampayuttasamuṭṭhānabhāvato ca.
tika-abh04t0:595_5: Atthato nikkhipitunti “tayo kusalahetū alobho adoso amoho”tiādīsu viya purimanayena dassitadhammeyeva
tika-abh04t0:596_1: Abhiññāyuttavajjānaṃ mahaggatānaṃ parittārammaṇattābhāvā “mahaggatā vā iddhividhādayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh04t0:597_2: tasmiṃ niyuttāni taṃ ekantena nipphādanato anatikkamanakānīti attho.
tika-abh04t0:597_5: Anekesu ānantariyesu katesu kiñcāpi balavatoyeva paṭisandhidānaṃ,
tika-abh04t0:597_7: attanā pana kātabbakiccassa teneva katattā tassa vipākassa upatthambhanavasena pavattanato na itarāni tena nivāritaphalāni nāma honti,
tika-abh04t0:597_8: ko pana vādo paṭipakkhesu kusalesūti vuttaṃ “paṭipakkhena anivāraṇīyaphalattā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:597_11: nanu anekesu ānantariyesu katesu balavaṃyeva paṭisandhidāyakanti tena itaresaṃ vipāko paṭibāhito hotīti āha “na ca tesa”ntiādi.
tika-abh04t0:597_12: Tañca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ appaṭibāhakattaṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārena vicāritameva.
tika-abh04t0:598_0: Atthato āpannaṃ aggahetvā yathārutavaseneva pāḷiyā atthaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vādānaṃ tapparabhāvena pavattiṃ
tika-abh04t0:598_2: Aniyyānikaniyyānikabhedaṃ pana sambhārakammaṃ bandhamokkhahetūti bandhamokkhahetuṃ paṭisedhentopi kammaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh04t0:598_3: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana vipākassa kammakilesasamādhipaññānaṃ hetubhāvato vipākopi bandhamokkhahetūti
tika-abh04t0:598_5: Tattha kammaṃ paṭisedhentenapi vipāko paṭisedhito hoti,
tika-abh04t0:598_6: vipākaṃ paṭisedhentenapi kammanti tayopi ete vādā atthato ubhayapaṭisedhakāti veditabbā.
tika-abh04t0:598_8: hetū”tiādinā raho nisīditvā cintentassa tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
tika-abh04t0:599_1: Sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatādivisiṭṭhabhāvepi maggapaccayassa sampayogavisiṭṭhatādīpaneneva
tika-abh04t0:599_2: sahajātādivisiṭṭhatāpi viññāyatīti pāḷiyaṃ “sampayutto”ti vuttanti “sampayogavisiṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ. Magga…pe… dassetuṃ,
tika-abh04t0:599_3: na pana maggaṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ maggapaccayabhāvābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh04t0:599_4: Evaṃ satīti yadi maggaṅgānaṃ maggapaccayalābhitāya pakāsano paṭhamanayo,
tika-abh04t0:599_6: Maggaṅgānipi vedanādayo viya maggahetukabhāvena vattabbattā amaggasabhāvānaṃ alobhādīnaṃ tadaññesaṃ tadubhayasabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh04t0:599_7: dhammānaṃ paccayabhāvadīpane tatiyanaye viya na ṭhapetabbānīti āha “ṭhapetvāti na vattabbaṃ siyā”ti.
tika-abh04t0:600_2: Tena sammādiṭṭhiyā purimasmiṃ nayadvaye ṭhapitattā tassa sahetukabhāvadassano tatiyanayo āraddhoti dasseti.
